items.name: SHELLY

starPowers.name: SHELL SHOCK
starPowers.description: Shelly's Super shells slow down enemies for 2 seconds!

starPowers.name: BAND-AID
starPowers.description: When Shelly falls below 40% health, she instantly heals for 1110 health. Band-Aid recharges in 15 seconds.

gadgets.name: FAST FORWARD
gadgets.description: Shelly dashes ahead, skipping a few unnecessary steps!

gadgets.name: CLAY PIGEONS
gadgets.description: On activation, for the next 5 seconds Shelly's main attacks focus the fire to a smaller area with an increased range.

items.description: Shelly's the perfect ranger: reliable, tough, and terrific with her shotgun. She never understood why Colt got to steal the limelight...

attack.name: Buckshot
attack.description: Shelly's boomstick fires a wide spread of pellets to a medium range. The more pellets hit, the greater the damage.

super.name: Super Shell
super.description: Shelly's Super Shell obliterates both cover and enemies. Any survivors get knocked back.

hypercharge.name: DOUBLE BARREL
hypercharge.description: Buffs while Hypercharged. Super Shell is 33% larger.

items.name: COLT

starPowers.name: SLICK BOOTS
starPowers.description: Colt's movement speed is increased by 13%.

starPowers.name: MAGNUM SPECIAL
starPowers.description: Colt's attack range and bullet speed are increased by 11%.

gadgets.name: SPEEDLOADER
gadgets.description: Colt instantly reloads 2 ammo.

gadgets.name: SILVER BULLET
gadgets.description: Colt's next attack is a powerful shot that deals as much damage as 2 of his regular bullets, while going through obstacles and opponents alike.

attack.name: Six-Shooters
attack.description: Colt shoots six straight long-range shots out of his revolvers.

super.name: Bullet Storm
super.description: Colt rattles off a massive burst of bullets that shoot extra far and destroy cover.

hypercharge.name: Dual Wielding
hypercharge.description: Bullet Storm is 120% wider.

items.description: Colt is the star attraction at Starr Park! His good looks, charisma and gun twirling tricks win over any audience, except maybe Shelly.

items.name: BULL

starPowers.name: BERSERKER
starPowers.description: When Bull falls below 60% health, his reload speed doubles!

starPowers.name: TOUGH GUY
starPowers.description: When Bull falls below 40% health, he gains a shield that reduces all damage he takes by 30%.

gadgets.name: T-BONE INJECTOR
gadgets.description: Bull instantly rejuvenates himself for 1000 health.

gadgets.name: STOMPER
gadgets.description: Bull can interrupt his Super charge and slow all nearby opponents with a massive stomp for 1.5 seconds.

attack.name: Double-Barrel
attack.description: Bull's double-barreled shotgun deals heavy damage. It has very short range, so Bull likes to get up close and personal.

super.name: Bulldozer
super.description: Bull puts his head down and bulldozes through opponents and obstacles. He's always been headstrong!

hypercharge.name: Jaws Of Steel
hypercharge.description: Bulldozer reduces damage taken by 80%.

items.description: Bull isn't as carefree as he was in his youth, but just because his rowdy days are behind him doesn't mean he won't still crush someone who's asking for it.

items.name: BROCK

starPowers.name: MORE ROCKETS!
starPowers.description: Rocket Rain now rains down 44% more rockets.

starPowers.name: ROCKET NO. 4
starPowers.description: Brock loads a fourth rocket into his launcher, increasing his ammo capacity (and discarding the thermos bottle he's been keeping in his launcher's fourth tube).

gadgets.name: ROCKET LACES
gadgets.description: Brock blasts the ground below him and propels himself into the air. The explosion deals 464 damage to nearby enemies.

gadgets.name: ROCKET FUEL
gadgets.description: Brock's next attack is a mega rocket that is bigger, badder, faster and destroys walls.

attack.name: Rockin' Rocket
attack.description: Brock lets fly with a single Rockin' Rocket that really goes the distance.

super.name: Rocket Rain
super.description: Brock fires a rocket barrage that takes out enemies and obstacles. He only wants to see you bathing in the Rocket Rain!

hypercharge.name: Rocket Barrage
hypercharge.description: Brock fires a Rocket Barrage, raining down rockets in the targeted area simultaneously in 4 waves.

items.description: Brock is a smack-talking video game enthusiast. His big attitude hides a more introverted personality, but he'll still do whatever it takes to win!

items.name: RICO

starPowers.name: SUPER BOUNCY
starPowers.description: Rico's bullets, from attack and Super alike, get Supercharged by their first bounce and deal +128 damage!

starPowers.name: ROBO RETREAT
starPowers.description: When Rico falls below 40% health, he runs 34% faster!

gadgets.name: MULTIBALL LAUNCHER
gadgets.description: Rico blasts waves of bouncy bullets in all directions.

gadgets.name: BOUNCY CASTLE
gadgets.description: Rico's next basic attack will heal him for 128 health from each projectile bounce.

attack.name: Bouncy Bullets
attack.description: Rico's bullets bounce off walls, gaining range. They can hit enemies behind cover.

super.name: Trick Shot
super.description: Rico fires a long burst of bullets that pierce through enemies and bounce off walls, gaining range.

hypercharge.name: Trick Shot King
hypercharge.description: Rico’s Super's projectiles bounce even further!

items.description: Rico is definitely a real space bounty hunter who tracks down the galaxy's most wanted criminals, not a gumball machine pretending to be cool.

items.name: SPIKE

starPowers.name: FERTILIZE
starPowers.description: After using Super, Spike regenerates 700 health per second by staying in its area of effect.

starPowers.name: CURVEBALL
starPowers.description: Spikes from the cactus grenade fly in a curving motion, making it easier to hit targets.

gadgets.name: POPPING PINCUSHION
gadgets.description: Spike shoots 3 waves of needles in all directions, dealing 540 damage per hit.

gadgets.name: LIFE PLANT
gadgets.description: Spike grows a large cactus with 1400 health to give cover to friendlies. If destroyed, the cactus bursts, and all nearby friendlies recover 840 health.

attack.name: Needle Grenade
attack.description: Spike fires off a small cactus that explodes, shooting spikes in different directions.

super.name: Stick Around!
super.description: Spike lobs a thorny grenade. Enemies caught in the blast area take damage and are slowed down.

hypercharge.name: Blooming Season
hypercharge.description: Stick Around has 20% larger area.

items.description: Most people think Spike is Colt and Shelly's cute sidekick at the Ranger Ranch. Nobody could begin to guess the depths of his trauma

items.name: BARLEY

starPowers.name: MEDICAL USE
starPowers.description: Barley regains 240 health from each attack.

starPowers.name: EXTRA NOXIOUS
starPowers.description: Adds +200 damage per second to Barley's attack.

gadgets.name: STICKY SYRUP MIXER
gadgets.description: Barley drops a sticky concoction that leaves a puddle, slowing down all enemies that make contact with it.

gadgets.name: HERBAL TONIC
gadgets.description: Barley throws a healing potion at nearby allies that creates an area that heals for 360 health per second.

attack.name: Undiluted
attack.description: Barley lobs a bottle, breaking it on the ground. Enemies take damage from the splash, and more damage over time if they stay in the puddle.

super.name: Last Call
super.description: Barley hurls a flurry of fiery bottles, covering a huge area in flames. This one's on the house!

hypercharge.name: Bottled-Up Rage
hypercharge.description: Barley hurls 3 big brews that also destroy all bushes on impact.

items.description: A bartending robot designed to mix drinks and banter with patrons, Barley also makes sure to keep his bar clean, to the detriment of anyone who makes a mess.

items.name: JESSIE

starPowers.name: ENERGIZE
starPowers.description: Jessie can repair her gun turret for 42 of its missing health by zapping it with her attack.

starPowers.name: SHOCKY
starPowers.description: Scrappy the Turret now shoots energy orbs that bounce between enemies. The orbs' range after a bounce is 51% of normal range.

gadgets.name: SPARK PLUG
gadgets.description: Jessie triggers a shockwave from her turret, slowing down all enemies within its area of effect.

gadgets.name: RECOIL SPRING
gadgets.description: Scrappy's attack speed is doubled for 5 seconds.

attack.name: Shock Rifle
attack.description: Jessie fires off an energy orb. After hitting a target the orb bounces to the next target in range, hitting up to three enemies. Each bounce deals 25% less damage.

super.name: Scrappy
super.description: Jessie deploys a gun turret that automatically shoots at enemies. It's made of 100% recycled materials!

hypercharge.name: Scrappy 2.0
hypercharge.description: Jessie's turret has 50% more health and deals 20% more damage.

items.description: Jessie is a prodigy who builds guns and gadgets from parts she finds in the junkyard. Maybe one day her mother Pam will see she can fend for herself!

items.name: NITA

starPowers.name: BEAR WITH ME
starPowers.description: Nita recovers 520 health whenever her bear hits an enemy Brawler. When Nita deals damage to an enemy Brawler, her bear regains 520 health.

starPowers.name: HYPER BEAR
starPowers.description: Nita's bear attacks faster. Time between swipes is reduced by 60%.

gadgets.name: BEAR PAWS
gadgets.description: Nita commands her bear to slam the ground, stunning all enemies within its reach.

gadgets.name: FAUX FUR
gadgets.description: For the next 3 seconds, Nita's bear gets a 35% shield against damage.

attack.name: Rupture
attack.description: Nita sends forth a shockwave, damaging enemies caught in the tremor.

super.name: Overbearing
super.description: Nita summons the spirit of Big Baby Bear to hunt down her enemies.

hypercharge.name: Hyperbearing
hypercharge.description: Nita hypercharges Bruce, making him increase in size, giving him 15% increased movement speed and 20% increased health.

items.description: Nita is a ferocious child who never backs down from a fight! The teddy bear on her head serves as a warning to others: don't poke the bear.

items.name: DYNAMIKE

starPowers.name: DYNA-JUMP
starPowers.description: Dynamike can ride the blast wave of his explosives to jump over obstacles!

starPowers.name: DEMOLITION
starPowers.description: Adds +800 damage to Mike's Super.

gadgets.name: FIDGET SPINNER
gadgets.description: Dynamike spins furiously with increased movement speed and throws multiple sticks of dynamite around himself. Each dynamite deals 1200 damage to enemies.

gadgets.name: SATCHEL CHARGE
gadgets.description: Once activated, the next main attack also stuns enemies for 1.5 seconds.

attack.name: Short Fuse
attack.description: Mike tosses two sticks of dynamite, passing over any obstacles in the way. The fuses are cut as short as Mike's explosive temper!

super.name: Big Barrel O' Boom
super.description: A big-bada-barrel of dynamite blows up cover. Any surviving enemies get knocked back on impact!

hypercharge.name: Boomer
hypercharge.description: Super bomb spawns smaller bombs.

items.description: Dynamike is an old miner and prospector who's become obsessed with explosions. Nothing makes him happier than a big boom!

items.name: EL PRIMO

starPowers.name: EL FUEGO
starPowers.description: Enemies caught in El Primo's Super will burn for 893 damage over 4 seconds.

starPowers.name: METEOR RUSH
starPowers.description: El Primo gains a 25% speed boost for 4 seconds after using his Super.

gadgets.name: SUPLEX SUPPLEMENT
gadgets.description: El Primo grabs the closest enemy within his reach and flips them like a pancake over his broad shoulders.

gadgets.name: ASTEROID BELT
gadgets.description: El Primo summons a small meteor to strike the nearest enemy. It deals 1520 damage and destroys walls.

attack.name: Fists Of Fury
attack.description: El Primo fires off a furious flurry of four fiery fists. That's a spicy jalapeno knuckle sandwich!

super.name: Flying Elbow Drop
super.description: Leaping high, El Primo drops an Intergalactic Elbow that knocks around enemies and destroys cover!

hypercharge.name: Gravity Leap
hypercharge.description: Leaping high, El Primo drops an Intergalactic Elbow that brings enemies to the Epicenter

items.description: El Primo is always in the spotlight and that's right where he wants to be! There's no audience he can't win over, except maybe his fellow performers...

items.name: MORTIS

starPowers.name: CREEPY HARVEST
starPowers.description: Mortis reaps the life essence of Brawlers he defeats, restoring 20% of his max health.

starPowers.name: COILED SNAKE
starPowers.description: Mortis gains his longer dash 2 seconds faster.

gadgets.name: COMBO SPINNER
gadgets.description: Mortis spins his shovel, hitting all enemies around himself for 1000 damage.

gadgets.name: SURVIVAL SHOVEL
gadgets.description: Mortis reloads faster for 4 seconds.

attack.name: Shovel Swing
attack.description: Mortis dashes forward with a sharp swing of his shovel, creating business opportunities for himself. When he has all three dashes ready, he'll gain a longer dash after a short delay.

super.name: Life Blood
super.description: Mortis calls forth a swarm of vampire bats that drain the health of enemy Brawlers while restoring his. Creepy!

hypercharge.name: Blood Boomerang
hypercharge.description: Life Blood now also returns to Mortis, allowing for double damage and healing.

items.description: Mortis had grand designs built around being a mortician and a vampire, but the fact that nobody is dying at Starr Park has put a huge damper on his plans.

items.name: CROW

starPowers.name: EXTRA TOXIC
starPowers.description: Crow's poison saps the strength of enemies, who deal 15% less damage while poisoned.

starPowers.name: CARRION CROW
starPowers.description: Crow deals +128 damage with his attack and Super to targets with 50% or less health.

gadgets.name: DEFENSE BOOSTER
gadgets.description: Crow gets a shield for 40% of incoming damage for 3 seconds.

gadgets.name: SLOWING TOXIN
gadgets.description: All currently poisoned enemies are slowed for 2 seconds.

attack.name: Switchblade
attack.description: Crow throws a triple threat of daggers. Enemies hit by the poisoned blades will take damage over time and have all healing effects reduced for the duration.

super.name: Swoop
super.description: Crow takes to the skies, throwing a ring of poisoned daggers around him both on take-off and landing.

hypercharge.name: Utility Knives
hypercharge.description: Crow's knives are piercing and are returning like a boomerang.

items.description: Crow trusts no one and keeps to himself. The most anyone knows about him is that he's often found at the diner, hanging out with Bull and Bibi.

items.name: POCO

starPowers.name: DA CAPO!
starPowers.description: When Poco's attack hits friendly Brawlers they now heal for 479 health.

starPowers.name: SCREECHING SOLO
starPowers.description: Poco's Super now also hits enemies, dealing 760 damage.

gadgets.name: TUNING FORK
gadgets.description: Poco and all nearby allies heal 370 health per second for 5 seconds.

gadgets.name: PROTECTIVE TUNES
gadgets.description: Removes active adverse effects from friendly Brawlers in a large area and gives a 4 second immunity.

attack.name: Power Chord
attack.description: Poco strums his guitarrón, sending forward bone-jarring sound waves. Enemies hit by the waves take damage.

super.name: Encore
super.description: Poco heals himself and all friends he can reach with his uplifting melody. Does not affect enemies.

hypercharge.name: Medic's Melody
hypercharge.description: Encore now overheals, adding a decaying shield for the amount overhealed. Shield lasts for 5 seconds.

items.description: Poco believes music can change people's lives. He's so enthusiastic about it that he never stops playing, even after people ask him to!

items.name: BO

starPowers.name: CIRCLING EAGLE
starPowers.description: Bo spots enemies hidden in bushes from 150% longer distance than normally.

starPowers.name: SNARE A BEAR
starPowers.description: Instead of a knockback, Bo's traps now stun the enemy for 2 seconds!

gadgets.name: SUPER TOTEM
gadgets.description: Bo places a totem that increases allies' Super charging rate by 50%. The totem slowly loses its health over time.

gadgets.name: TRIPWIRE
gadgets.description: Bo triggers all of his mines after 1.5 seconds. During the delay the mines are completely undetectable to opponents.

attack.name: Eagle-Eyed
attack.description: Bo releases a trio of exploding arrows, tearing up enemies like an eagle's talons.

super.name: Catch A Fox
super.description: Bo hides explosive traps in the ground. When triggered by an enemy, the traps explode after a short delay, knocking back and damaging enemies.

hypercharge.name: Catch a Bear
hypercharge.description: Bo's Super deploys 5 mines instead of 3. These do not override any mines already placed by his Super, so it is possible to have more than 7 mines on the map!

items.description: Bo has survived in the Rumble Jungle for a long time. It's all the more impressive considering he's been using toys he got on sale from the Gift Shop.

items.name: PIPER

starPowers.name: AMBUSH
starPowers.description: Piper's attack deals +595 extra damage (at max range) when she's hidden in a bush.

starPowers.name: SNAPPY SNIPING
starPowers.description: When Piper hits an opponent with her attack, she reloads 0.4 ammo instantly.

gadgets.name: AUTO AIMER
gadgets.description: Piper pops a defensive shot at the closest enemy, dealing 85 damage, while also pushing them back.

gadgets.name: HOMEMADE RECIPE
gadgets.description: On activation, Piper's next main attack will home in on enemies.

attack.name: Gunbrella
attack.description: Piper fires a sniper shot from the tip of her parasol. The shot gains more oompf the farther it flies!

super.name: Poppin'
super.description: Piper hops away to avoid pushy suitors. She leaves them a lady's favor though: live grenades from her garter!

hypercharge.name: Boppin'
hypercharge.description: Piper drops even more bombs as she departs at an increased speed! She also destroys terrain when she lands.

items.description: Piper wants nothing more than to be the local village baker who hands out pies, cookies and other sweet treats! Just don't ask about her past.

items.name: PAM

starPowers.name: MAMA'S HUG
starPowers.description: Whenever Pam hits enemy Brawlers with Scrapstorm, she heals herself and nearby friendly Brawlers for 48 health.

starPowers.name: MAMA'S SQUEEZE
starPowers.description: Healing turret now also damages enemies for 480 damage per second.

gadgets.name: PULSE MODULATOR
gadgets.description: Pam triggers her turret to emit a pulse that heals allies inside the turret's range, including herself, for 960 health.

gadgets.name: SCRAPSUCKER
gadgets.description: Each hit from Pam's next attack removes 25% of opposing Brawlers' maximum ammo. Pam reclaims 50% of the ammo for herself.

attack.name: Scrapstorm
attack.description: Pam sprays a large area with bursts of scrap metal. Safety goggles advised!.

super.name: Mama's Kiss
super.description: Pam's healing turret will fix up her and teammates who stay in its area of effect.

items.description: Pam handles an enormous workload at the junkyard and always gets it done! It's just a shame it keeps her away from her daughter, Jessie...

items.name: TARA

starPowers.name: BLACK PORTAL
starPowers.description: Tara's Super cracks open a dimensional portal! A shadowy version of Tara appears and attacks her enemies.

starPowers.name: HEALING SHADE
starPowers.description: Tara's Super cracks open a dimensional portal! A shadowy version of Tara appears to heal Tara and her teammates.

gadgets.name: PSYCHIC ENHANCER
gadgets.description: Tara and her allies are able to see all enemies, even inside bushes, for 4 seconds.

gadgets.name: SUPPORT FROM BEYOND
gadgets.description: Tara surrounds herself with three weak shadows that attack opponents and disappear after 6 seconds.

attack.name: Triple Tarot
attack.description: Tara flicks her wrist, snapping off three tarot cards that pierce through enemies. Quite a trick!

super.name: Gravity
super.description: Tara conjures up a mind-boggling gravity well! Enemies in the area of effect get pulled in, crashing together painfully hard.

hypercharge.name: Supermassive
hypercharge.description: Gravity has 20% larger area.

items.description: Tara has seen in the cards that great difficulties lie ahead! But don't despair... she has a terrific selection of magical trinkets for sale to help with that.

items.name: DARRYL

starPowers.name: STEEL HOOPS
starPowers.description: After Barrel Roll all damage Darryl takes is reduced by 25% for 2 seconds.

starPowers.name: ROLLING RELOAD
starPowers.description: When Darryl uses his Super, he doubles his reload speed for 5 seconds.

gadgets.name: RECOILING ROTATOR
gadgets.description: Darryl spins around and sprays a barrage of shots in all directions. Each shot deals 300 damage and recharges his Super by 25% if it hits enemies!

gadgets.name: TAR BARREL
gadgets.description: Darryl creates a slowing area around himself for 5 seconds.

attack.name: Double Deuce
attack.description: Darryl's double barrel shotguns fire two staggered blasts of heavy close-range damage.

super.name: Barrel Roll
super.description: Darryl rolls forward inside his barrel, knocking back enemies, reducing incoming damage and bouncing off walls. His Super recharges over time!

hypercharge.name: Barrel o' Bullets
hypercharge.description: Shoots his shotguns around himself during a Barrel Roll. Each shot does 300 damage.

items.description: Darryl put on the pirate captain's hat in a bid to avoid work, but now he's forced to defend his ship! Who knew being in charge took actual effort?

items.name: PENNY

starPowers.name: HEAVY COFFERS
starPowers.description: Penny's gold pouches burst with a 100% wider cone after each hit.

starPowers.name: MASTER BLASTER
starPowers.description: Penny's cannon deals 686 damage and knocks back nearby enemies on landing.

gadgets.name: SALTY BARREL
gadgets.description: Penny drops a barrel of salt that blocks enemy projectiles. She can also use it to burst her own gold pouches.

gadgets.name: TRUSTY SPYGLASS
gadgets.description: Penny's cannon blasts at every visible enemy position within range.

attack.name: Plunderbuss
attack.description: Shoots out a pouch of fool's gold. If the pouch hits an enemy, it bursts and coins pepper targets behind the first enemy.

super.name: Old Lobber
super.description: Penny sets up her cannon! It can shoot at enemies at a long range, over cover and setting the ground on fire.

hypercharge.name: New Lobber
hypercharge.description: Penny deploys a bigger cannon that shoots 2 cannonballs at a time instead of 1.

items.description: Penny doesn't care about studying old maps or puzzling over sea shanty riddles. She's a pirate so she can blow stuff up and grab whatever she wants!

items.name: FRANK

starPowers.name: POWER GRAB
starPowers.description: Frank steals the power of a Brawler he defeats, increasing his damage by 25% for 12 seconds!

starPowers.name: SPONGE
starPowers.description: Frank gains +670 health.

gadgets.name: ACTIVE NOISE CANCELING
gadgets.description: Frank clears any disabling effect on himself, and momentarily becomes immune to stuns, slows and knockbacks.

gadgets.name: IRRESISTIBLE ATTRACTION
gadgets.description: Frank's next attack deals an extra 50% damage and pulls opponents towards him.

attack.name: Hammer Hit
attack.description: Frank takes a while to wind up his hammer blow, but the hit is so hard it sends a shockwave. His attack speed goes up when his health goes down.

super.name: Stunning Blow
super.description: Frank's greatest hit sends a shockwave that destroys environment and stuns enemies for a while.

hypercharge.name: Seismic Smash
hypercharge.description: Frank's Super now hits an entire circle around him!

items.description: Frank is a good-natured giant who helps out at the mortuary by day and spins tunes at the Club by night. He doesn't get a lot of sleep, and it shows.

items.name: GENE

starPowers.name: MAGIC PUFFS
starPowers.description: Gene heals all friendly Brawlers around him for 288 health per second.

starPowers.name: SPIRIT SLAP
starPowers.description: Gene's Magic Hand also damages enemies, dealing 2000 damage on hit.

gadgets.name: LAMP BLOWOUT
gadgets.description: All enemies close to Gene are instantly pushed back. If at least one enemy Brawler is within range, Gene will also restore 10% of his max health.

gadgets.name: VENGEFUL SPIRITS
gadgets.description: Gene shoots a homing missile at all visible opponents within a large area, dealing up to 800 damage based on distance.

attack.name: Smoke Blast
attack.description: Gene shoots a solid ball of magical smoke from his lamp. If the ball doesn't hit a target, it splits up and spreads the damage in a cone.

super.name: Magic Hand
super.description: Gene launches a magical hand from his lamp. If the hand hits an enemy, they get pulled back to Gene's location!

hypercharge.name: Hyper Hands
hypercharge.description: Gene's Super splits into 3 different hands, each being able to grab one enemy. First goes straight, and the other 2 go diagonally.

items.description: Most people look at Gene and see a funny little guy in a costume. What they don't see is that his personality is split between his body and his teapot.

items.name: TICK

starPowers.name: WELL OILED
starPowers.description: When Tick takes no damage and doesn't attack, he starts recovering health 2 seconds faster than normal.

starPowers.name: AUTOMA-TICK RELOAD
starPowers.description: Tick's reload time is 9% shorter.

gadgets.name: MINE MANIA
gadgets.description: Tick's next attack fires 6 mines.

gadgets.name: LAST HURRAH
gadgets.description: Tick gains a 50% shield for 1.0 seconds. After that, it bursts out for 680 damage.

attack.name: Minimines
attack.description: Tick lobs a cluster of mines that separate before landing. The mines explode on contact with a target, or after a few seconds.

super.name: Headfirst
super.description: Tick detaches and launches his head. After landing, the head hops toward the nearest target and explodes on contact!

hypercharge.name: Headstrong
hypercharge.description: Tick quickly deploys his head, charging enemies faster and leaving behind 6 of his minimines on explosion.

items.description: Tick follows Penny around like a pet as she plots her next big scheme. He isn't good for much besides blowing things up, but that's usually plenty!

items.name: LEON

starPowers.name: SMOKE TRAILS
starPowers.description: When Leon uses his Super, he gains a 30% boost to his movement speed for the duration of his invisibility.

starPowers.name: INVISIHEAL
starPowers.description: Leon recovers 680 health per second while his Super is active.

gadgets.name: CLONE PROJECTOR
gadgets.description: Leon creates an illusion of himself to confuse his enemies.

gadgets.name: LOLLIPOP DROP
gadgets.description: Leon creates a stealthy area for his team to hide in. The lollipop slowly loses its health over time.

attack.name: Spinner Blades
attack.description: Leon flicks his wrist and fires four Spinner Blades. The blades deal less damage the farther they travel.

super.name: Smoke Bomb
super.description: Leon becomes invisible for 6 seconds. If he attacks, he will be revealed. Enemies close to Leon will be able to spot him.

hypercharge.name: Limbo
hypercharge.description: Leon stays invisible while attacking his enemies.

items.description: Since Leon doesn't like hanging with other people much, his ability to become invisible comes in handy. Only his little sister, Nita, seems to get through to him.

items.name: ROSA

starPowers.name: PLANT LIFE
starPowers.description: Rosa recovers 150 health per second when inside a bush.

starPowers.name: THORNY GLOVES
starPowers.description: Rosa's punches gain +138 damage during her Super.

gadgets.name: GROW LIGHT
gadgets.description: Rosa fertilizes the ground around her and bushes instantly grow to provide great cover.

gadgets.name: UNFRIENDLY BUSHES
gadgets.description: All opponents hiding in bushes take 138 damage and get slowed down for 3 seconds.

attack.name: Hands Of Stone
attack.description: Rosa throws a flurry of powerful punches with perfect technique!

super.name: Strong Stuff
super.description: Rosa gets a second skin of tough vine for 3 seconds, decreasing all damage received by 70% for the duration.

hypercharge.name: Grasping Roots
hypercharge.description: Rosa slows down all nearby enemies while her Super is active.

items.description: Rosa is a botanist with a strong connection to plants. She's also a boxer, and won't hesitate to punch one of her specimens if it goes out of control!

items.name: CARL

starPowers.name: POWER THROW
starPowers.description: Carl throws his Pickaxe with 10% more speed, allowing it to travel and return faster.

starPowers.name: PROTECTIVE PIROUETTE
starPowers.description: During Carl's Super, all damage he receives is reduced by 35%.

gadgets.name: HEAT EJECTOR
gadgets.description: The next pickaxe Carl throws will drop a trail of hot rocks behind it! Opponents that touch them are set on fire and receive 370 damage per second.

gadgets.name: FLYING HOOK
gadgets.description: Carl's next attack makes his pickaxe pull him to the farthest point of the attack.

attack.name: Pickaxe
attack.description: Carl throws his Pickaxe like a boomerang. After he catches the returning Pickaxe, he can throw it again.

super.name: Tailspin
super.description: Carl goes into a crazy spin for a few seconds, flailing around and damaging nearby opponents.

hypercharge.name: Flamespin
hypercharge.description: Carl gains a flame trail while using his Super. The trail burns on contact, causing damage over time.

items.description: Carl is a mining robot who's fascinated by rocks and stones of all kinds. Don't let him get started on his latest obsession: the effects of Gems!

items.name: BIBI

starPowers.name: HOME RUN
starPowers.description: Bibi's movement speed is increased by 12% when her Home Run bar is fully charged.

starPowers.name: BATTING STANCE
starPowers.description: When Bibi's Homerun bar is fully charged, she shields herself from all damage by 20%.

gadgets.name: VITAMIN BOOSTER
gadgets.description: Bibi heals 480 health per second for 4 seconds.

gadgets.name: EXTRA STICKY
gadgets.description: Bibi's next Spitball slows down enemies on hit for 3 seconds!

attack.name: Three Strikes
attack.description: Bibi swings her baseball bat. When she has three swings at the ready, her Home Run bar will charge. Once fully charged, her next swing will knock back enemies!

super.name: Spitball
super.description: Bibi bats a bouncing ball of bubble gum that can go through enemies, and even hit the same target multiple times!

hypercharge.name: Out Of Bounds
hypercharge.description: Bibi's bouncing ball splits when hitting an enemy

items.description: Bibi is a tough punk with a baseball bat and an attitude to match. She's a bit of a nerd too, but she'd never show it. She's got an image to maintain!

items.name: 8-BIT

starPowers.name: BOOSTED BOOSTER
starPowers.description: Increases the Damage Booster's range by 50% and boosts damage by an additional 15%.

starPowers.name: PLUGGED IN
starPowers.description: When 8-Bit is near his Damage Booster, he will plug in and have increased movement speed.

gadgets.name: CHEAT CARTRIDGE
gadgets.description: 8-Bit instantly teleports to his Damage Booster.

gadgets.name: EXTRA CREDITS
gadgets.description: 8-Bit's next attack has the number of projectiles increased to 18.

attack.name: Blaster Beams
attack.description: Shoots a burst of Blaster Beams that damage any opponent they hit. The beams have a slight spread.

super.name: Damage Booster
super.description: Deploys a turret that increases the damage output of all friendly Brawlers in its area of effect.

hypercharge.name: Aimbot
hypercharge.description: 8-Bit's turret now has a laser that shoots nearby enemies. Shots do 230 damage.

items.description: An arcade game famous for its brutal difficulty, 8-Bit always hated its players. Now that it's missing one of its guns, it's angrier than ever before.

items.name: SANDY

starPowers.name: RUDE SANDS
starPowers.description: Sandstorm now also damages enemies for 108 damage per second.

starPowers.name: HEALING WINDS
starPowers.description: Sandstorm now also heals friendly Brawlers for 190 health per second.

gadgets.name: SLEEP STIMULATOR
gadgets.description: Sandy falls asleep for 1.5 seconds and his health is fully restored.

gadgets.name: SWEET DREAMS
gadgets.description: Sandy's next attack lulls opponents to sleep for 1.0 seconds. They will, however, wake up from any damage.

attack.name: Pebble Blast
attack.description: Sandy pelts enemies with sharp, piercing pebbles. Ouch!

super.name: Sandstorm
super.description: Sandy summons a sandstorm that lasts for 9 seconds and hides friendly Brawlers inside it.

hypercharge.name: Swift Winds
hypercharge.description: Sandy grants himself and his allies 20% increased movement speed while inside of Sandstorm. His Super will also silence enemies for 0.5 seconds when it lands.

items.description: On the rare occasions Sandy wakes from his slumber, he tries to help his big sister Tara around their store. But it's never long before he falls asleep again.

items.name: BEA

starPowers.name: INSTA BEALOAD
starPowers.description: Instantly Supercharge Bea's Big Sting one time if she misses a Supercharged shot.

starPowers.name: HONEYCOMB
starPowers.description: Bea receives a 30% shield while Big Sting is Supercharged.

gadgets.name: HONEY MOLASSES
gadgets.description: Bea drops a beehive with a splash of sticky honey around it. The honey slows down enemies that step in it.

gadgets.name: RATTLED HIVE
gadgets.description: Bea unleashes 4 angry bees that circle away from her, dealing more damage the further they go (up to 600 damage).

attack.name: Big Sting
attack.description: Bea sends out a long range shot that, upon landing, Supercharges her next shot to deal epic damage!

super.name: Iron Hive
super.description: Bea deploys a swarm of drones that move and turn like jets. They slow down any opponents caught in their path.

hypercharge.name: Protect the Queen
hypercharge.description: Bea's Super projectiles split into 2 when at max distance (and on hit), increasing her Super's distance and spread even more.

items.description: Bea spends her day watching bugs as they go about their lives, imagining what they'd say if she could understand them... or even what it's like to be one.

items.name: EMZ

starPowers.name: BAD KARMA
starPowers.description: Enemies that stay within the cloud of Emz's toxic hair spray suffer increasing damage, 25% per hit.

starPowers.name: HYPE
starPowers.description: Emz recovers 288 health per second for each enemy Brawler inside her Super's area of effect.

gadgets.name: FRIENDZONER
gadgets.description: Emz pushes back all enemies around her while also dealing 338 damage.

gadgets.name: ACID SPRAY
gadgets.description: Emz's next blast of hair spray can pass through walls, but deals 10% less damage.

attack.name: Spray
attack.description: Emz gives you a blast of her hair spray! It's strong enough to melt your face.

super.name: Caustic Charisma
super.description: Emz creates a cloud of toxicity around herself, slowing down the movement of enemies and damaging them.

hypercharge.name: Overhyped Haze
hypercharge.description: Emz pushes enemies to the outer edge of her Super on activation and follows up with a dose of her spray.

items.description: Emz supposedly works for her uncle Mortis at the mortuary, but she rarely makes an appearance there. She's too busy hawking her hairspray brand online.

items.name: MR. P

starPowers.name: HANDLE WITH CARE
starPowers.description: Every 4 seconds, the explosion damage of Mr. P's next overstuffed suitcase is increased by 40%.

starPowers.name: REVOLVING DOOR
starPowers.description: All robo-porters from the home base now have 20% more health and 30% higher damage.

gadgets.name: SERVICE BELL
gadgets.description: Mr. P buffs his current porter by increasing its damage by 114 and health by 680.

gadgets.name: PORTER REINFORCEMENTS
gadgets.description: The next attack will spawn a weak porter where the attack lands.

attack.name: Your Suitcase, Sir!
attack.description: Mr. P throws a heavy suitcase with angry intent. Upon hitting an obstacle or reaching maximum range, the suitcase bounces and lands with a bang, dealing area damage.

super.name: Porters! Attack
super.description: Mr. P deploys the home base for his robo-porters. He has reprogrammed the small penguin-head robots to attack and harass opponents (and unruly guests).

hypercharge.name: Super Porters! Assemble!
hypercharge.description: Mr. P's home base now spawns much stronger porters and he can have two active 'Super Porters' at the same time.

items.description: Mr. P is in over his head trying to run a hotel. He's always yelling at his employees to work faster, as if they could understand his gibberish!

items.name: MAX

starPowers.name: SUPER CHARGED
starPowers.description: Max now charges her Super while moving.

starPowers.name: RUN N GUN
starPowers.description: Max reloads faster while moving.

gadgets.name: PHASE SHIFTER
gadgets.description: Max dashes forward, and becomes immune to all damage from enemies while dashing.

gadgets.name: SNEAKY SNEAKERS
gadgets.description: Max blinks back to a place of her choosing after 3 seconds' delay, recovering any damage she received in the meantime.

attack.name: Faster Blaster
attack.description: Max's blaster shoots a bunch of projectiles fast! It holds a lot of rounds, and Max is quick with the reload.

super.name: let's Go!
super.description: Max momentarily boosts up her movement speed and that of nearby allies. Gotta go fast!

hypercharge.name: Unlimited Energy
hypercharge.description: Max throws an energy drink to each team member, increasing their movement speed and granting them 25% Super charge.

items.description: Fuelled by energy drinks, Max speeds to the scene whenever someone needs help. She never sticks around long enough to do much... but she sure is fast!

items.name: JACKY

starPowers.name: COUNTER CRUSH
starPowers.description: When receiving damage, Jacky returns the favor by converting 30% of the damage into a Groundbreaker counterattack.

starPowers.name: HARDY HARD HAT
starPowers.description: Jacky's Hard Hat protects her by reducing any damage she takes by 20%.

gadgets.name: PNEUMATIC BOOSTER
gadgets.description: Jacky gets a burst of energy and moves 25% faster for 4 seconds.

gadgets.name: REBUILD
gadgets.description: Jacky rebuilds the environment in a small radius around her.

attack.name: Groundbreaker
attack.description: Jacky hops on her Jackhammer to shake the ground all around. Enemies caught too close will get a pounding!

super.name: Holey Moley!
super.description: Jacky drills a hole in the ground, pulling in foes to introduce them to her Jackhammer!

hypercharge.name: Seismic Event
hypercharge.description: Holey Moley slows down nearby enemies for 1.5 seconds.

items.description: Jacky is a miner who can't resist mouthing off about her wild work experiences using very colorful language! Luckily, the bad words are drowned out by the noise of her jackhammer

items.name: GALE

starPowers.name: BLUSTERY BLOW
starPowers.description: Gale's Super now stuns enemies for 1.2 seconds if they are pushed against obstacles.

starPowers.name: FREEZING SNOW
starPowers.description: Gale's snow balls now also slow down opponents for 0.5 seconds.

gadgets.name: SPRING EJECTOR
gadgets.description: Gale drops a bounce pad underfoot, launching friend and foe alike into the air.

gadgets.name: TWISTER
gadgets.description: Gale uses his leaf blower to create a local tornado, which will push away any opponents that try to pass through.

attack.name: Polar Vortex
attack.description: Gale blasts a large snow ball wall at his enemies!

super.name: Gale Force!
super.description: Gale delivers an almighty gust of wind and snow, pushing back all enemies caught in its path.

hypercharge.name: Blizzard
hypercharge.description: Gale’s Super is slightly wider and fires twice, pushing enemies even further away!

items.description: Gale's job is to use his snowblower to clear the areas around Mr. P's Snowtel. Nobody mentioned anything about stopping when the guests were around...

items.name: NANI

starPowers.name: AUTOFOCUS
starPowers.description: Peep deals up to 925 extra damage based on his travel distance.

starPowers.name: TEMPERED STEEL
starPowers.description: Nani takes 80% less damage while her Super is active.

gadgets.name: WARPIN' TIME
gadgets.description: Nani detonates Peep and teleports to his last location.

gadgets.name: RETURN TO SENDER
gadgets.description: For the next 2 seconds, the first time Nani takes damage from an enemy, 80% of the damage is returned to the enemy.

attack.name: Trigger-Nometry
attack.description: Nani shoots 3 light orbs that move at different angles and converge towards aimed targets.

super.name: Manual Override
super.description: Nani takes control of Peep and can steer him remotely into enemies, exploding on contact!

hypercharge.name: Big Peep
hypercharge.description: Peep grows in size during travel.

items.description: Originally a security camera, Nani was modified to keep an eye on Jessie. Unfortunately, she can hardly keep up with the precocious girl!

items.name: SPROUT

starPowers.name: OVERGROWTH
starPowers.description: Every 5 seconds, the next Seed Bomb will explode with a larger explosion radius.

starPowers.name: PHOTOSYNTHESIS
starPowers.description: Sprout activates a shield, partially protecting itself from all attacks while inside a bush.

gadgets.name: GARDEN MULCHER
gadgets.description: Sprout consumes a bush to restore 990 health.

gadgets.name: TRANSPLANT
gadgets.description: Sprout destroys its current Hedge, but will instantly have its Super fully charged again.

attack.name: Seed Bomb
attack.description: Sprout propels a ball of seeds that bounces around before bursting with a bang! If it makes contact with enemies, it explodes on impact.

super.name: Hedge
super.description: Sprout uses its Super Seed to grow a thick vine hedge, creating an impassable though temporary obstacle.

hypercharge.name: Thorns
hypercharge.description: Sprout's vine hedge now damages nearby enemies

items.description: Sprout appears to be a cute gardening robot who helps Rosa around the Biodome, but it's actually an incubator with arms and wheels for a strange pink seed!

items.name: SURGE

starPowers.name: TO THE MAX!
starPowers.description: Surge's main attack now splits when hitting walls.

starPowers.name: SERVE ICE COLD
starPowers.description: Surge keeps his STAGE 1 Super upgrade for the full match duration.

gadgets.name: POWER SURGE
gadgets.description: Surge overloads his circuits and increases his upgrade level by 1 for 10 seconds.

gadgets.name: POWER SHIELD
gadgets.description: Within the next 2 seconds, Surge consumes 50% of the damage of the next incoming hit and uses the energy to reload 2 ammo.

attack.name: Juice Of Justice
attack.description: Surge serves a shot of Juice that splits in two on contact with enemies.

super.name: Party Tricks
description: With each Super, Surge gets upgraded (MAX 3). Upgrades are lost when Surge is defeated.
STAGE 1: Boosted movement speed.
STAGE 2: Increased weapon range.
STAGE 3: Main attack splits into 6 (instead of 2).

hypercharge.name: Level 5
hypercharge.description: Surge's shots now ALWAYS split and have increased range!

items.description: Surge is souped-up soda fountain, always ready to get the party started! He's got the beats, the moves, and an endless supply of energy drinks.

items.name: COLETTE

starPowers.name: PUSH IT
starPowers.description: All enemy Brawlers hit by Colette's charge are carried to the farthest point of the attack!

starPowers.name: MASS TAX
starPowers.description: Colette's Super gives her a 20% shield for 5 seconds. Every enemy Brawler hit by it will add 10% more protection.

gadgets.name: NA-AH!
gadgets.description: Colette's next shot deals extra 750 damage.

gadgets.name: GOTCHA!
gadgets.description: On activation, Colette's shots heal herself for 5 seconds for 80% of the damage dealt.

attack.name: Taxing Shot
attack.description: Colette fires a shot that takes what you owe! And the more you have, the more you owe.

super.name: Time To Collect
super.description: Colette makes a dash forth and back, dealing taxing damage to everyone in her path, based on their maximum health.

hypercharge.name: Teen Spirit
hypercharge.description: Colette's spirit follows her during her dash, damaging enemies on the way.

items.description: Colette has collected every single figurine, plushie, and toy of every single Brawler. Is she obsessed? Yes. But has she lost touch with reality? Also yes.

items.name: AMBER

starPowers.name: WILD FLAMES
starPowers.description: Amber can have two fuel puddles on the ground simultaneously and she will recharge her Super automatically when standing near one.

starPowers.name: SCORCHIN' SIPHON
starPowers.description: While being near a puddle of fire fluid, Amber uses it to reload her firebreathing 50% faster.

gadgets.name: FIRE STARTERS
gadgets.description: Amber runs fast for 3 seconds while spilling her fire fluid, which she can then ignite.

gadgets.name: DANCING FLAMES
gadgets.description: Amber creates 3 orbiting flames around her for 5 seconds, dealing 945 damage on hit.

attack.name: Dragon's Breath
attack.description: Amber blows a flaming inferno at her opponents. It looks awesome, but watch out or you'll get seared!

super.name: Torch 'Em!
super.description: Amber throws a flask of her fire fluid that she can then light up with her firebreathing. Bushes and opposing Brawlers will be toast! (One flask at a time!)

hypercharge.name: Oil Spill
hypercharge.description: Super's oil spill area is increased. Oil keeps burning for 3 seconds after being lit on fire.

items.description: Amber brings the heat, literally! She's overconfident about her fire abilities despite being a bit of a klutz. With her, it's spectacle first, and safety last.

items.name: LOU

starPowers.name: SUPERCOOL
starPowers.description: Opponents standing on Lou's Super area get frozen 33% faster.

starPowers.name: HYPOTHERMIA
starPowers.description: Opponents lose up to 50% of their damage based on how frozen they are from Lou's attacks.

gadgets.name: ICE BLOCK
gadgets.description: Lou shields himself with ice, becoming invulnerable for 1.0 seconds.

gadgets.name: CRYO SYRUP
gadgets.description: Instantly adds 50% freeze meter to opponents inside Lou's Super.

attack.name: Brain Freeze
attack.description: Barraging opponents with snow cones, Lou can eventually freeze them in place for 1.5 seconds.

super.name: Can-Do
super.description: Lou lobs a can of freezing cold syrup that creates an icy, slippery area on the ground that also slowly freezes enemies. Very tough for his opponents' fancy footwork!

hypercharge.name: Slushie Storm
hypercharge.description: Lou's Super instantly freezes enemies in the area.

items.description: Lou is a robot snow cone salesman who's yet to make his first sale. Being located on a snowy mountain peak might have something to do with that.

items.name: BYRON

starPowers.name: MALAISE
starPowers.description: Byron's Super will also cause opponents to receive 75% less healing from any source for 9 seconds.

starPowers.name: INJECTION
starPowers.description: Every 3.5 seconds the next basic attack will pierce through targets.

gadgets.name: SHOT IN THE ARM
gadgets.description: Byron uses one of his shots to heal himself 597 per second for 3 seconds.

gadgets.name: BOOSTER SHOTS
gadgets.description: Byron's next attack shoots 3 darts instead of one, each dealing 20% less damage and 40% less healing.

attack.name: Careful Dose
attack.description: Shoots a long range dart that can hit both opponents and friendlies. Opponents will take damage over time and friendlies will heal over time.

super.name: Full Treatment
super.description: Throws a vial that heals friendlies and damages opponents.

hypercharge.name: Unstable Concoction
hypercharge.description: Byron's Super also fires his main attack in all directions from the point of impact.

items.description: Byron has invented many concoctions and tinctures that heal or harm in various ways.... but most of them fall into the harming category

items.name: EDGAR

starPowers.name: HARD LANDING
starPowers.description: Edgar's Super will also deal 675 damage to nearby enemies upon landing.

starPowers.name: FISTICUFFS
starPowers.description: Edgar receives 25% more healing from damage he deals.

gadgets.name: LET'S FLY
gadgets.description: Edgar's Super charges faster, 525% for 4 seconds.

gadgets.name: HARDCORE
gadgets.description: Edgar gets a shield that protects him from the next 1650 damage. The shield gets weaker over time.

attack.name: Fight Club
attack.description: Hits enemies with quick punches, healing himself for each landed punch.

super.name: Vault
super.description: Edgar jumps over any obstacle and gets a temporary speed boost. His Super will slowly charge over time.

hypercharge.name: Outburst
hypercharge.description: After using Super gain charging speed and reload speed for few seconds.

items.description: Edgar believes nobody understands him. Certainly not his mom, who thinks he's going through a phase. Only he knows the darkness in his soul is eternal.

items.name: RUFFS

starPowers.name: AIR SUPERIORITY
starPowers.description: Supply Drop now includes a bomb that adds 120% more damage to the drop and also allows it to destroy walls.

starPowers.name: FIELD PROMOTION
starPowers.description: Friendly Brawlers have their maximum health increased by 45 every second that they are in range of this ability while it's active.

gadgets.name: TAKE COVER
gadgets.description: Ruffs throws down 3 sandbags as cover. Each one has 35% of Ruffs' max health.

gadgets.name: AIR SUPPORT
gadgets.description: Ruffs calls a barrage around the nearest opponent, dealing 960 damage with each hit.

attack.name: Double-Barrel Laser
attack.description: Ruffs' twin-laser bounces off walls multiple times. They can hit opponents behind cover.

super.name: Suppy Drop
super.description: Ruffs calls down a supply drop that damages any opponent it hits, and leaves a power-up for friendly Brawlers to pick up. The power-up increases health and damage. Multiple power-ups do not stack, and you lose the power-up if defeated.

hypercharge.name: The Goodest Boy
hypercharge.description: Ruffs's Super deals 25% more damage and his power-up fully charges a Hypercharge.

items.description: Ruffs is a loyal, highly disciplined space colonel who runs a tight ship and does everything by the book. But deep down, he just wants to be a good boy!

items.name: STU

starPowers.name: ZERO DRAG
starPowers.description: Stu's Nitro Boost Super dash distance increases by 71%.

starPowers.name: GASO-HEAL
starPowers.description: Using his Nitro Boost Super restores 256 of Stu's health.

gadgets.name: SPEED ZONE
gadgets.description: Stu drops a booster that makes himself, his teammates and other allies move faster while inside its area of effect.

gadgets.name: BREAKTHROUGH
gadgets.description: Stu's next Super can bash through obstacles, making debris fly forward. Each piece of debris deals 108 damage to any opponent it hits.

attack.name: Razzle Dazzle
attack.description: Stu fires out two pyrotechnic shots that pack quite a wallop.

super.name: Nitro Boost
super.description: Hitting an opponent with Razzle Dazzle charges up Stu's Nitro Boost, a short dash that leaves a trail of burning rubber on the ground. The trail will set fire to any opponents that touch it.

hypercharge.name: Infinitro
hypercharge.description: Stu's Super can be used continuously while Hypercharged.

items.description: A little punch-drunk from too many bumps, bruises, and gasoline fumes over his long stunt performing career, Stu is a bit wobbly on his wheel these days.

items.name: BELLE

starPowers.name: POSITIVE FEEDBACK
starPowers.description: Belle gains a 20% shield whenever her Electro-Bolts hit a target.

starPowers.name: GROUNDED
starPowers.description: Getting marked by Belle's Super prevents the opponent from reloading their attack for 5 seconds.

gadgets.name: NEST EGG
gadgets.description: Belle places a trap on the ground that will explode when triggered by an opponent. The trap deals 312 damage, and slows down anyone within its blast radius for 3 seconds.

gadgets.name: REVERSE POLARITY
gadgets.description: Belle's next Electro-Bolt bounces from walls.

attack.name: Shocker
attack.description: Belle shoots a long range Electro-Bolt, dealing damage to any target hit. After a short delay, the bolt will jump to any nearby target, deal damage and jump to the next one.

super.name: Spotter
super.description: Belle fires a spotting shot that marks any opponent it hits. The marked opponent takes extra damage from any source. Only one target can be marked at a time.

hypercharge.name: Magnetic
hypercharge.description: Belle's spotting shot automatically follows the closest target

items.description: The leader of the notorious Goldarm Gang, Belle is after more than money. She wants to find out the truth behind Starr Park and bring it down!

items.name: SQUEAK

starPowers.name: CHAIN REACTION
starPowers.description: Each opponent within the area of a Sticky Blomb's explosion increases the Blomb's damage by 15%.

starPowers.name: SUPER STICKY
starPowers.description: Secondary Sticky Blomb explosions from Squeak's Super also slow down opponents for 4 seconds.

gadgets.name: WINDUP
gadgets.description: Squeak's next Sticky Blomb deals 50% more damage and has 100% longer range.

gadgets.name: RESIDUE
gadgets.description: Squeak's next Sticky Blomb leaves a residue area behind after exploding, slowing down enemies and giving allies sight into bushes for 6 seconds.

attack.name: Stick Blomb
attack.description: Squeak's sticky blobs of goo are unstable, and blow up with a big splash and an ouch! They attach to any opponent they hit outright.

super.name: Big Blob
super.description: Squeak lobs a blob that blows up with aplomb! The explosion of goo sends six smaller Sticky Blombs in all directions.

hypercharge.name: Bouncy Blob
hypercharge.description: The Sticky Blombs from Squeak's Super now bounce and split one more time.

items.description: Squeak is a blob of happy energy who loves his creator, Ruffs. He's a joy to be around, at least if you are unaware that he's made of dog slobber

items.name: GROM

starPowers.name: FOOT PATROL
starPowers.description: When Grom's Super is fully charged, he gains +15% faster movement speed!

starPowers.name: X-FACTOR
starPowers.description: The split from Grom's main attack deals up to +30% extra damage at max distance.

gadgets.name: WATCHTOWER
gadgets.description: Grom ejects a Watchtower from his Grom Bomb that gives all allies sight into bushes over a large area. The watchtower slowly loses health over time.

gadgets.name: RADIO CHECK
gadgets.description: Grom's next attack throws 3 Buds in rapid succession.

attack.name: Bud Go Boom!
attack.description: Grom hurls Bud, his exploding walkie-talkie! The blast moves in the shape of a cross, hurting enemies caught in its path.

super.name: Grom Bomb
super.description: Grom launches a devastating bomb with Bud's help! The Grom Bomb inflicts huge damage, breaks walls and the force from its blast pushes all enemies backwards.

hypercharge.name: Grom Bomb Goes Boom!
hypercharge.description: Grom’s Super gains a secondary explosion after the first, in an X-pattern. This explosion also deals damage, breaks walls, and knocks enemies back.

items.description: Grom is a brawny security guard with one weak point: the flashbacks he gets from his time working at a kindergarten. Those kids were merciless.

items.name: BUZZ

starPowers.name: TOUGHER TORPEDO
starPowers.description: The minimum duration of Buzz's Super stun is increased by 0.5 seconds.

starPowers.name: EYES SHARP
starPowers.description: Buzz's Super charging area is increased by 33%.

gadgets.name: RESERVE BUOY
gadgets.description: Instantly fills the Super meter, but the next Torpedo Throw doesn't stun opponents.

gadgets.name: X-RAY-SHADES
gadgets.description: Buzz can see into all bushes in his Super charging area for 12 seconds.

attack.name: Buzz Off
attack.description: Buzz blows on his lifeguard whistle, piercing nearby ears five times in an arc.

super.name: Torpedo Throw
super.description: Buzz throws out his torpedo buoy. If it hits an opponent or a wall, Buzz hauls himself over there, stunning nearby opponents where he lands. The stun time increases based on distance travelled.

hypercharge.name: Buzzwatch
hypercharge.description: Buzz can throw his torpedo multiple times in a row

items.description: Buzz is a lifeguard at the Velocirapids water park and a real stickler for the rules. He clearly enjoys wielding the tiny bit of authority he has to the greatest degree possible.

items.name: GRIFF

starPowers.name: KEEP THE CHANGE
starPowers.description: Furious Griff tosses coins faster, reducing the time for a full salvo by 25%.

starPowers.name: BUSINESS RESILIENCE
starPowers.description: Every 2 seconds, Griff regains up to 15% of his missing health.

gadgets.name: PIGGY BANK
gadgets.description: Griff drops a firecracker-filled piggy bank that explodes after a short delay, destroying obstacles and dealing 700 damage to opponents within range.

gadgets.name: COIN SHOWER
gadgets.description: Griff's next Coin Toss shoots 33% more coins.

attack.name: Coin Toss
attack.description: Angry Griff pelts opponents with coins. He throws three salvos that spread out in a cone.

super.name: Cashback
super.description: Griff throws a bunch of sharp-edged banknotes in a wide cone. Too valuable to just give away, they return to him, and may cause paper cuts twice to the same target. Opponents further away take more damage.

hypercharge.name: Tax Debate
hypercharge.description: Griff's banknotes multiply at max range before returning, with the newly created banknotes returning after a delay. They also pierce the environment.

items.description: Griff acts like a rich, successful entrepreneur, but his only business is the failing Starr Park Gift Shop. Oddly, he's never around when the bank calls.

items.name: ASH

starPowers.name: FIRST BASH
starPowers.description: When hitting an opponent with his attack charges full, Ash gets even more angry. His Rage goes up by 200%.

starPowers.name: MAD AS HECK
starPowers.description: Ash progressively gains up to 40% faster reload speed, equal to how enraged he's become.

gadgets.name: CHILL PILL
gadgets.description: Though furious, Ash has to collect himself. A full Rage meter will recover 1620 health when this gadget is popped - less Rage, less recovery.

gadgets.name: ROTTEN BANANA
gadgets.description: Ash loses 10% health and instantly gains 40% rage.

attack.name: Clean-Up
attack.description: Ash angrily smashes down with his broom. Get out of the way or you might bite the dust!

super.name: Little Helpers
super.description: Robotic rats for cleaning up? That's right, they explode on contact, dealing damage to opponents and greatly increasing Ash's Rage level.

hypercharge.name: Rat King
hypercharge.description: Little Helper spawns 5 more rats!

items.description: Ash has the thankless job of keeping the park clean. He's climbed into a trash can to protect himself from broken glass and rat bites. It makes him grumpy!

items.name: MEG

starPowers.name: FORCE FIELD
starPowers.description: Meg is protected by a 25% shield for 10 seconds when her Mecha is destroyed.

starPowers.name: HEAVY METAL
starPowers.description: Upon expiring, the Mecha suit explodes, dealing 1200 damage to nearby opponents and pushing them away.

gadgets.name: JOLTING VOLTS
gadgets.description: Heal the Mecha by 259 health per second for 5 seconds.

gadgets.name: TOOLBOX
gadgets.description: Meg drops her toolbox, which increases the reload speed for nearby allies by 35% until it gets destroyed.

items.description: Content to work behind the scenes with her trusty mecha suit, Meg takes care of real problems, while Max and Surge are out entertaining the crowds.

attack.name: Target Acquired
attack.description: Meg fires a short burst from her blaster that pokes at her enemies' patience.

super.name: Mega Machina
super.description: Meg jumps into her Mecha suit for some colossal carnage!

attack.name: Crowd Control
attack.description: A strong barrage of bullets that leaves nothing to chance. It's the quickest way to make crowds disperse!

super.name: Feel the Steel
super.description: The Mecha swings a formidable forearm that enemies will see and feel.

hypercharge.name: Tungsten Toughness
hypercharge.description: Meg's Mecha has an increased swipe range when activating it's Super. While out of the Mecha, Meg pops a defensive shield for protection.

items.name: LOLA

starPowers.name: IMPROVISE
starPowers.description: When down to her last round, Lola deals an extra 30% damage.

starPowers.name: SEALED WITH A KISS
starPowers.description: Projectiles from Lola's Ego will heal allies that are caught in its path by 112 health.

gadgets.name: FREEZE FRAME
gadgets.description: Lola's Ego stops moving to strike a pose! Gaining a 50% shield for 4 seconds.

gadgets.name: STUNT DOUBLE
gadgets.description: Lola and her Ego switch locations. She recovers 760 health.

attack.name: Diamond Eyes
attack.description: Lola's favorite accessory is also her favorite weapon! It shoots from the eyes in short bursts and with plenty of panache.

super.name: Megalomaniac
super.description: Lola releases her Ego that mimics her every move. If it's too close to Lola though, it will deal less damage.

hypercharge.name: Inflated Ego
hypercharge.description: Spawns a mega inflated Ego with increased health and damage!

items.description: Lola makes sure everyone knows when she enters a room. She's an expert in the fine art of causing a scene to get what she wants, and she's proud of it!

items.name: FANG

starPowers.name: FRESH KICKS
starPowers.description: When Fang defeats an enemy Brawler with his Super, it's recharged instantly, allowing him to use his Super again!

starPowers.name: DIVINE SOLES
starPowers.description: Reduce 344 damage from incoming hits once every 3 seconds. Maximum reduction is 90% of the incoming damage.

gadgets.name: CORN-FU
gadgets.description: Fang tosses a handful of corn kernels into the air, making it rain popcorn! Each kernel pop deals 544 damage.

gadgets.name: ROUNDHOUSE KICK
gadgets.description: Fang spins and hits all enemies around him, stunning them for 0.5 seconds.

attack.name: Wu-Shoe
attack.description: Fang unleashes a swift kick with a hidden trick. If the kick misses the target, his shoe will fly off his foot!

super.name: Sneak Ahead
super.description: Fang flies into a nasty kick that, upon contact, can chain a further 3 consecutive kicks to nearby enemies.

hypercharge.name: Dragon Kick
hypercharge.description: Charge through walls while dropping popcorn on the way.

items.description: Fang has absorbed so many kung-fu movies he practically lives in one. He's confident, charming, and never uses his hands if he can kick instead!

items.name: EVE

starPowers.name: UNNATURAL ORDER
starPowers.description: Reverses the order of the eggs shot by her Egg Shooter.

starPowers.name: HAPPY SURPRISE
starPowers.description: Every 5 seconds, the next largest egg hitting an enemy of her Egg Shooter will spawn a hatchling.

gadgets.name: GOTTA GO!
gadgets.description: Eve jumps away and leaves behind a hatchling.

gadgets.name: MOTHERLY LOVE
gadgets.description: Hatchlings spawned from an active big egg will now heal allies over time instead of dealing damage.

attack.name: Egg Shooter
attack.description: Eve shoots three eggs in a row, with each one being bigger and dealing more damage than the previous egg.

super.name: Baby Boom
super.description: Eve releases a big egg, which incubates a group of hatchlings. Hatchlings attach to enemies and deal damage over time.

hypercharge.name: Generations
hypercharge.description: Baby boom now spawns hatchlings over time!

items.description: Eve's purpose in life is to mother and protect her precious babies! She'll do whatever it takes to find them a good home... preferably in Ruffs' fur

items.name: JANET

starPowers.name: STAGE VIEW
starPowers.description: While in the air with her jetpack, Janet reveals a large area of bushes around herself.

starPowers.name: VOCAL WARM UP
starPowers.description: Janet's attack focuses 30% faster.

gadgets.name: DROP THE BASS
gadgets.description: Janet deploys a speaker that deals 100 damage per second to all enemies in the area until it gets destroyed.

gadgets.name: BACKSTAGE PASS
gadgets.description: Janet's next High Note pushes her back, even over walls. The more focused her attack is, the further she'll be pushed back.

attack.name: High Note
attack.description: Janet sings a loud note. The longer she holds the note, the more focused it will become and the farther it will fly.

super.name: Crescendo
super.description: Janet uses her jetpack to take to the skies for a moment, where she attacks opponents from above for the full duration.

hypercharge.name: Magnum Opus
hypercharge.description: Janet retains full movement control during her Super.

items.description: Janet will do whatever it takes to reach the top! As a bonus, her performing skills come in handy for rescuing her sister Bonnie, whenever she gets into trouble.

items.name: BONNIE

starPowers.name: BLACK POWDER
starPowers.description: The range of Bonnie's Star Launcher is increased by 36%.

starPowers.name: WISDOM TOOTH
starPowers.description: Loose Tooth shatters on hit, dealing 25% extra damage to nearby enemies.

gadgets.name: SUGAR RUSH
gadgets.description: Clyde's movement and reload speed are increased by 30% for 5 seconds.

gadgets.name: CRASH TEST
gadgets.description: Bonnie dashes forward, knocking back enemies and dealing 1160 damage on hit.

items.description: Bonnie is a bundle of uncontrollable and totally destructive energy. Her dream is to be fired from her cannon, all the way to the moon!

attack.name: Loose Tooth
attack.description: Bonnie shoots a HUGE tooth from Clyde towards her enemies.

super.name: Star Launcher
super.description: Clyde launches Bonnie into the air. She can fly over obstacles and deals damage to nearby enemies on landing.

attack.name: Bomber Jacket
attack.description: Bonnie flings a cluster of small grenades from her sleeves.

super.name: Clyde
super.description: Bonnie calls Clyde and jumps into it, taking control of the cannon.

hypercharge.name: Daredevil
hypercharge.description: Bonnie stuns enemies for 1 sec when firing and landing from Clyde, plus she spits damage dealing teeth around her.

items.name: OTIS

starPowers.name: STENCIL GLUE
starPowers.description: Cil mightily squeezes the enemy with all his might. Preventing them from attacking for 33% longer.

starPowers.name: INK REFILLS
starPowers.description: Otis now shoots 33% more ink drops.

gadgets.name: DORMANT STAR
gadgets.description: The next starfish will stay on the ground if an enemy is not hit, laying dormant until an enemy gets close.

gadgets.name: PHAT SPLATTER
gadgets.description: Otis's next attack shoots a giant ink ball that leaves a puddle, dealing 575 damage over time for 3.8 seconds.

attack.name: Inky Art
attack.description: Otis squirts a burst of ink drops from his spray gun arm.

super.name: Silent Seabed
super.description: Otis flings Cil who grabs onto the first enemy hit and prevents them from attacking for a short while.

hypercharge.name: Silent Stunner
hypercharge.description: Otis's Super now also stuns for 1.5 seconds on impact.

items.description: Otis is a young street artist on the come-up who works by shooting ink at the walls. Nobody knows his true identity, which only adds to his mystique!

items.name: SAM

starPowers.name: HEARTY RECOVERY
starPowers.description: Upon recalling his Knuckle Busters, Sam instantly recovers 20% of his missing health.

starPowers.name: REMOTE RECHARGE
starPowers.description: While the Knuckle Busters are on the ground and near enemies, they will charge up Sam's Super.

gadgets.name: MAGNETIC FIELD
gadgets.description: While the Knuckle Busters are on the ground, Sam can activate them to pull in nearby enemies.

gadgets.name: PULSE REPELLENT
gadgets.description: Upon landing on the ground, Sam's next deployed Knuckle Busters releases an electric pulse that knocks back enemies.

attack.name: Heavy Haymakers
attack.description: Sam unleashes a double dose of hard-hitting punches. With his gloves on, he deals a lot more damage.

super.name: Knuckle Busters
super.description: Sam throws his Knuckle Busters, dealing damage to all enemies hit, before landing on the ground. His next Super will return them back to his hands and also deals damage.

hypercharge.name: Hyper Fist
hypercharge.description: Sam’s Knuckle Busters travel faster and will fully charge his Super if they hit an enemy Brawler during the Hypercharge.

items.description: A former factory worker turned wanted member of the Goldarm Gang, Sam is always there to ensure Belle doesn't go too far on their latest heist!

items.name: GUS

starPowers.name: HEALTH BONANZA
starPowers.description: Healing gained from spirits are increased by 100%.

starPowers.name: SPIRIT ANIMAL
starPowers.description: Spooky increases the damage of a teammate by 25% for 5 seconds.

gadgets.name: KOOKY POPPER
gadgets.description: Explode all uncollected spirits, dealing 1080 damage to nearby enemies.

gadgets.name: SOUL SWITCHER
gadgets.description: Gus loses 5% health but gains 100% spirit instantly.

attack.name: Loony Balloons
attack.description: Gus shoots balloons at enemies. After several hits, a spirit will drop. Collected spirits will restore some health to Gus or his teammates.

super.name: Spooky Boy
super.description: Gus uses Spooky (a balloon creation and also his best friend), to create a shield around himself or one of his teammates and pushes nearby enemies back.

hypercharge.name: Generations
hypercharge.description: Baby boom now spawns hatchlings over time!

items.description: Gus looks so much like a ghost child that he's often mistaken for one. Perhaps fittingly, he's an enthusiast of all things Supernatural, since he's too innocent to be scared.

items.name: BUSTER

starPowers.name: BLOCKBUSTER
starPowers.description: Buster's Lens Flare deals 15% more damage for each ally in his Super's charge area.

starPowers.name: KEVLAR VEST
starPowers.description: While Montage is active Buster takes 10% less damage and is immune to knockbacks, slows and stuns.

gadgets.name: UTILITY BELT
gadgets.description: Buster heals himself and all nearby allies for 450 health for each ally in his Super's charge area.

gadgets.name: SLO-MO REPLAY
gadgets.description: Buster's next Lens Flare pulls enemies towards him.

attack.name: Lens Flare
attack.description: Buster shoots a cone of light from his projector, damaging all enemies within range.

super.name: Montage
super.description: Buster projects a shield in front of him, blocking all enemy projectiles and reflecting the energy back towards enemies.

hypercharge.name: Plot Armor
hypercharge.description: Buster's shield is now 360 degrees around him and reflected projectiles deal more damage!.

items.description: Buster took a film projector from the movie theater where he works so he can play around with it like a prop. It's dangerous and highly unprofessional!

items.name: CHESTER

starPowers.name: SINGLE BELL'O'MANIA
starPowers.description: The first bell of Chester's attack sequence does 200% damage.

starPowers.name: SNEAK PEEK
starPowers.description: Chester will always know what his next Super will be.

gadgets.name: SPICY DICE
gadgets.description: Chester gets a new random Super that is different from his current one.

gadgets.name: CANDY BEANS
gadgets.description: Chester eats a mystery flavored candy bean from his cap, gaining a random buff for 5 seconds.

items.description: Chester makes vicious fun of anyone in sight, trying to get under their skin. The more hate he gets, the better... especially if that hater is Mandy!

attack.name: Cap And Bells
attack.description: Chester shoots a sequence of bells from his cap, first one, then two, then three, and lastly four bells.

super.name: Jack-In-The-Box
super.description: Chester's Super is randomly chosen from 5 different abilities each time it is charged.

attack.name: Cap And Bells
attack.description: Chester shoots a sequence of bells from his cap, first one, then two, then three, and lastly four bells.

superVariations.name: Explosion - Candy Popper
superVariations.description: Chester throws an exploding candy popper that destroys the environment, knocking back and damaging enemies.

superVariations.name: Stun - Jawbreaker
superVariations.description: Chester shoots a large, hard candy that stuns enemies on hit.

superVariations.name: Poison - Salmiakki
superVariations.description: Chester sprays a cone of salty salmiakki powder that poisons enemies, damaging them over time.

superVariations.name: Area - Pop Rocks
superVariations.description: Chester sprinkles crackling pop rocks on the ground, damaging enemies over time when standing on it.

superVariations.name: Heal - Strong Mint
superVariations.description: Chester eats a refreshing mint that heals him over time.

hypercharge.name: Crunchy, Chewy, Gooey
hypercharge.description: Chester combines 3 of his Super abilities into one. He throws a sweet that explodes and deals damage, spreads a poison cloud, and leaves a lingering slowing area to finish.

items.name: GRAY

starPowers.name: FAKE INJURY
starPowers.description: When Gray has full health, the next damage taken is reduced by 50%.

starPowers.name: NEW PERSPECTIVE
starPowers.description: When Gray or his Allies use Doors, they recover 660 health.

gadgets.name: WALKING CANE
gadgets.description: Gray's next hit from the Finger Pistol shoots a walking cane which pulls enemies back by a bit.

gadgets.name: GRAND PIANO
gadgets.description: Draco can not fall under one health for 2 seconds.

attack.name: Finger Pistol
attack.description: Are the bullets even real?

super.name: Dimensional Doors
super.description: Gray creates a set of doors for him and his teammates, useful for quick escapes and sneaky attacks!

hypercharge.name: Another Dimension
hypercharge.description: Gray opens a new pair of portals that shield him and allies for 1000 when they pass through.

items.description: Gray styles himself as a character in an old silent film. He takes the act seriously but sometimes forgets to keep his mouth shut when doing finger bullets.

items.name: MANDY

starPowers.name: IN MY SIGHTS
starPowers.description: Mandy shoots her candies with 20% more speed while Focused.

starPowers.name: HARD CANDY
starPowers.description: Mandy receives 40% shield while Focused.

gadgets.name: CARAMELIZE
gadgets.description: Mandy's next candy from her Candy Dispenser slows down enemies on hit for 2.5 seconds.

gadgets.name: COOKIE CRUMBS
gadgets.description: Mandy's next candy from her Candy Dispenser pierces enemies and environment.

attack.name: Candy Dispenser
attack.description: Mandy shoots candy from her Candy Dispenser and while staying still she gains Focus, increasing her attack range.

super.name: Sugar Ray
super.description: Mandy shoots a long ray of sugar passing through enemies and environment, dealing massive damage.

hypercharge.name: Sugar for All!
hypercharge.description: Mandy fires her Super in three different directions.

items.description: Mandy runs a candy store where she dresses in costume and doles out sweet treats. She's a little too into the act and rules her candy kingdom with an iron fist.

items.name: R-T

starPowers.name: QUICK MATHS
starPowers.description: Marks created last 3 seconds longer.

starPowers.name: RECORDING
starPowers.description: R-T and his legs take 20% less damage when split.

gadgets.name: OUT OF LINE
gadgets.description: Instantly charges R-T's Super.

gadgets.name: HACKS!
gadgets.description: Instantly trigger all active marks on all enemy brawlers, dealing their damage.

items.description: R-T is designed to be a helpful information kiosk, but he's also been given the task of monitoring all activity within Starr Park. For safety reasons, of course.

attack.name: Tap Target
attack.description: R-T fires a single projectile, that upon impact with a brawler, marks them. Any damage dealt to a marked target consumes the mark and deals extra damage.

super.name: Hide And Seek
super.description: R-T splits into two. R-T's legs are left behind while both R-T and his legs gain a short ranged, powerful attack that marks enemies. R-T moves faster while split.

attack.name: Eat Static
attack.description: R-T and his legs blast a strong signal, damaging all targets around them.

super.name: Radar Waves
super.description: R-T instantly teleports to his legs, becomes whole again, and heals.

hypercharge.name: 360-Degree Surveillance
hypercharge.description: Damaging security lasers surround R-T and his legs after using a Hypercharged Super.

items.name: WILLOW

starPowers.name: LOVE IS BLIND
starPowers.description: Lantern's Curse also reduces reload speed of affected brawlers by 30%.

starPowers.name: OBSESSION
starPowers.description: Hexed enemies gain 33% movement speed while mind controlled.

gadgets.name: SPELLBOUND
gadgets.description: Willow's next Lantern's Curse deals 300 more damage and applies the entire damage instantly rather than over time.

gadgets.name: DIVE
gadgets.description: Willow dives for 2 seconds, becoming untargetable but unable to take any action for the duration.

attack.name: Lantern's Curse
attack.description: Willow lobs her lantern, dealing damage over time to enemies hit.

super.name: Hex
super.description: Willow fires a single tadpole towards an enemy brawler, fully healing them and taking control over their mind if it hits. Willow can use the basic attack of the enemy brawler and move them as she pleases. Mind control breaks after 4 seconds or when the brawler reaches 30% HP.

hypercharge.name: Psychic Safety
hypercharge.description: Willow gains an invulnerability shield on landing her Hex. She remains shielded until the Hex is broken.

items.description: Willow works as a gondoliera in the Swamp of Love. She gives couples in search of a romantic evening the creepiest, most unsettling time they could imagine.

items.name: MAISIE

starPowers.name: PINPOINT PRECISION
starPowers.description: Pressure rocket deals 20% more damage at max distance.

starPowers.name: TREMORS
starPowers.description: Enemies hit by Shockwave are also slowed down for 2 seconds.

gadgets.name: DISENGAGE!
gadgets.description: Maisie blasts the ground, stunning enemies for 0.5 seconds while dashing forward.

gadgets.name: FINISH THEM!
gadgets.description: Maisie instantly reloads 1 ammo and increases the next Pressure Rocket damage by 30% of the target's missing HP.

attack.name: Pressure Rocket
attack.description: The further you run, the faster Maisie's rocket will reach you.

super.name: Shockwave
