super.description: Don't get too close or a personal space will be created for you.

hypercharge.name: Aftermath
hypercharge.description: Maisie's Super also shoots her basic attack projectiles around her to all directions.

items.description: Maisie works as a safety coordinator, but deep down she enjoys dangerous situations. Sometimes, it almost feels like she has a hand in creating them.

items.name: HANK

starPowers.name: IT'S GONNA BLOW
starPowers.description: When Balloon Blast is charged over 80%, Hank gains 10% extra movement speed.

starPowers.name: TAKE COVER!
starPowers.description: Hank takes 40% reduced damage for 3 seconds.

gadgets.name: WATER BALLOONS
gadgets.description: The next Balloon Blast also slows down enemies for 3 seconds.

gadgets.name: BARRICADE
gadgets.description: Hank takes 40% reduced damage for 3 seconds.

attack.name: Balloon Blast
attack.description: The longer you hold, the deadlier the blast.

super.name: Fish Torpedoes
super.description: Hank launches Fish Torpedoes in all directions, and he heals for a part of his missing health.

hypercharge.name: Home Fish-iles
hypercharge.description: The Fish Torpedoes that Hank fires with his Super have been upgraded to home in on targets!

items.description: Hank is a one-shrimp, one-tank army on a mission to liberate sea life from kitchens and markets everywhere. Chefs, consider yourselves on notice!

items.name: CORDELIUS

starPowers.name: COMBOSHROOMS
starPowers.description: Hitting the second mushroom to the same target as the first, deals 30% extra damage.

starPowers.name: MUSHROOM KINGDOM
starPowers.description: Cordelius spawns 3 mushrooms to the Shadow Realm after using his Super, healing allies and damaging enemies for 800 health on pickup.

gadgets.name: REPLANTING
gadgets.description: Cordelius jumps over a piece of terrain quickly.

gadgets.name: POISON MUSHROOM
gadgets.description: Cordelius's next main attack shoots a poison mushroom that prevents the enemy from attacking for 1.0 seconds.

attack.name: Mushrooms
attack.description: Cordelius shoots two mushrooms with his gardening tool, damaging enemies on hit.

super.name: This Is My Domain
super.description: Cordelius shoots a Shadow Mushroom that passes through walls and on hit transfers the target and him to the Shadow Realm for 8 seconds. Cordelius has 20% higher movement speed and 30% faster reload speed in the Shadow Realm.

hypercharge.name: Complete Darkness
hypercharge.description: Cordelius slows down his targets when sending them to the Shadow Realm

items.description: Gardener and caretaker of the Enchanted Forest. Obsesses over mushrooms and is hostile towards strangers.

items.name: DOUG

starPowers.name: FAST FOOD
starPowers.description: Resurrected targets gain increased movement speed for 3 seconds after being resurrected.

starPowers.name: SELF SERVICE
starPowers.description: Snack Attack also heals Doug by 20% of the normal value.

gadgets.name: DOUBLE SAUSAGE
gadgets.description: The next Snack Attack only heals allies but doubles the amount.

gadgets.name: EXTRA MUSTARD
gadgets.description: The next Snack Attack only damages enemies but doubles the amount.

attack.name: Snack Attack
attack.description: Fresh food for friends, expired for others. Heals allies and damages enemies.

super.name: Second Serving
super.description: A special spiced up hot dog for a target ally or Doug himself. When a buffed Brawler is defeated they will come back with 100% health after a short delay.

hypercharge.name: Free Toppings
hypercharge.description: Doug's Snack Attack is also mirrored for the ally buffed with the Second Serving.

items.description: Doug's hot dogs will extend your friends' shelf life.

items.name: PEARL

starPowers.name: HEAT RETENTION
starPowers.description: Super will consume 50% less Heat when used.

starPowers.name: HEAT SHIELD
starPowers.description: While the Heat is over 80%, reduce damage taken by 20%.

gadgets.name: OVERCOOKED
gadgets.description: Next basic attack shoots burning cookies, dealing 25% extra damage over 3 seconds.

gadgets.name: MADE WITH LOVE
gadgets.description: Next basic attack shoots perfectly baked cookies healing allies for 25% of the damage overtime instead.

attack.name: Hot Cookies
attack.description: Rapid fire hot cookies directly out from the oven, slightly cooling the oven while damaging enemies on hit. The higher the Heat the higher the damage.

super.name: Let Out Some Steam
super.description: Consume and release all the built up Heat in an explosion, damaging all nearby enemies. The higher the Heat the higher the damage.

hypercharge.name: Pyrolytic
hypercharge.description: Let Out Some Steam leaves a burning area behind for 4.5 seconds.

items.description: Against all odds, Pearl found her way into Belle and Sam's hardened hearts thanks to her disarmingly warm nature. Besides, who can resist chocolate cookies?

items.name: CHUCK

starPowers.name: PIT STOP
starPowers.description: Increase the maximum amount of Posts by 1.

starPowers.name: TICKETS PLEASE!
starPowers.description: Dashing through enemies with his Super will also steal 33% of their ammo.

gadgets.name: REROUTING
gadgets.description: Chuck removes the nearest Post and recharges his Super.

gadgets.name: GHOST TRAIN
gadgets.description: Chuck's next Super can go through walls!

attack.name: Steam Engine
attack.description: Shoots a cloud of steam from Chuck's hat, piercing and damaging enemies.

super.name: Steam Engine
super.description: Dash to the nearest Post in line of sight, damaging enemies on the way. While no Posts are in line of sight, throw a new Post to the ground.

hypercharge.name: Full Steam Ahead!
hypercharge.description: Chuck has unlimited range on his next dash and leaves clouds of damaging steam behind him!

items.description: Once a brilliant maestro, now a train conductor, Chuck traded the symphonies of the concert halls for the cacophonies of the Ghost Station, all in the hope of discovering the next big thing in music!

items.name: CHARLIE

starPowers.name: DIGESTIVE
starPowers.description: Cocooned enemies lose 25% of their health while cocooned.

starPowers.name: SLIMY
starPowers.description: Cocoon leaves a slimy trail behind it for 5 seconds that slows down enemies walking over it.

gadgets.name: SPIDERS
gadgets.description: Charlie releases 3 spiders that seek and attack the nearest enemies.

gadgets.name: PERSONAL SPACE
gadgets.description: Charlie cocoons herself, healing 50% of her total health.

attack.name: Yo-Yo
attack.description: Charlie slings her yo-yo forward, damaging the first enemy hit and then returning back to her.

super.name: Cocoon
super.description: Charlie throws forward a bundle of hair wrapping around an enemy on hit, disabling them until the hairy cocoon is destroyed.

hypercharge.name: Pestilence
hypercharge.description: Cocoon spawns 3 spiders that seek and attack the nearest enemies.

items.description: Itsy bitsy Charlie, Put on a crazy show, She let down her hair, And made off with all your dough. In came the crowd, It filled up the circus tent, So Charlie weaved away while, Taking every cent!

items.name: MICO

starPowers.name: MONKEY BUSINESS
starPowers.description: Every 5 seconds, Mico's basic attack steals ammo from his enemies after hitting them.

starPowers.name: RECORD SMASH
starPowers.description: Mico deals 100% extra damage against non brawlers.

gadgets.name: CLIPPING SCREAM
gadgets.description: Mico lets out a deafening scream towards the nearest enemy, dealing 285 damage and slowing down enemies for 2 seconds on hit.

gadgets.name: PRESTO
gadgets.description: Mico's next jump has 34% longer range.

attack.name: Mic Boom
attack.description: Mico jumps forward for a short distance attacking with his mic boom and damaging nearby enemies after landing.

super.name: Out Of Frame
super.description: Mico jumps out of frame, becoming invulnerable while controlling his landing position and damaging nearby enemies when landing.

hypercharge.name: Sound Check
hypercharge.description: Mico's super also stuns nearby enemies after landing for 1.5 seconds.

items.description: Mico's the sound guy in Brawlywood, but one could be forgiven for thinking he's actually a celebrity given all the bragging and name-dropping. Hot-tempered and unstable, he cannot take a joke. Don't ever call him funny...

items.name: KIT

starPowers.name: POWER HUNGRY
starPowers.description: Kit gains 150% power from each Power Cube.

starPowers.name: OVERLY ATTACHED
starPowers.description: Kit attaches to friendly brawlers for 5 seconds longer.

gadgets.name: CARDBOARD BOX
gadgets.description: Hide in a cardboard box becoming invisible for 3 seconds. Charges the Super 100% faster while stationary.

gadgets.name: CHEESEBURGER
gadgets.description: Heals himself and the friendly Brawler he is attached to for 30%.

items.description: Stuck giving autographs to his rabid fans at Starr Toon Studios, cartoony superstar Kit often daydreams of becoming relevant in the industry again, respected for his acting chops rather than his looks.

attack.name: Claws
attack.description: Claw nearby enemies in a cone.

super.name: Carry Me
super.description: Jump and attach to the back of another Brawler. Heals allies and damages enemies over time.

attack.name: Yarn Balls
attack.description: Throw exploding yarn balls while attached to a friendly Brawler.

hypercharge.name: Making Biscuits
hypercharge.description: Kit's Super stuns the enemy but he can move and attack normally. Attaching to teammates will heal them more and his Yarn Balls have a longer range.

items.name: LARRY & LAWRIE

starPowers.name: PROTOCOL: PROTECT
starPowers.description: While Lawrie is in range, transfer 30% incoming damage to himself instead.

starPowers.name: PROTOCOL: ASSIST
starPowers.description: While Lawrie is in range, reload 30% of your ammo whenever he damages an enemy.

gadgets.name: ORDER: SWAP
gadgets.description: Swap weapons with Lawrie.

gadgets.name: ORDER: FALL BACK
gadgets.description: Dash towards Lawrie while Lawrie dashes towards you, healing both for 25% of max health.

attack.name: Ticket Dispenser
attack.description: Shoot a ticket bundle over obstacles that explodes twice after landing, damaging nearby enemies.

super.name: Call For Backup
super.description: Throw a signal to summon your twin Lawrie for help. He will seek out any trouble makers and serve justice with his taser gun.

items.description: Larry sells tickets to Starr Park visitors under the watchful eye of his twin, Lawrie. Larry loves rules, they make life easier! Lawrie doesn't love rules so much as enforcing them. They make a good team.

items.name: MELODIE

starPowers.name: FAST BEATS
starPowers.description: Melodie gains 6% increased movement speed from each note orbiting her.

starPowers.name: EXTENDED MIX
starPowers.description: Melodie's notes last for 25% longer before vanishing.

gadgets.name: PERFECT PITCH
gadgets.description: Melodie's notes get 25% increased movement speed and 60% wider orbit for 5 seconds.

gadgets.name: INTERLUDE
gadgets.description: Melodie gains 10% Shield from each note orbiting her.

attack.name: Monster Notes
attack.description: Melodie shoots tiny monster notes from her mic, damaging enemies and spawning orbiting notes around her on hit.

super.name: Catchy Chorus
super.description: Melodie can dash forward multiple times to catch her enemies.

hypercharge.name: Flash Mob
hypercharge.description: Melodie adds up to 3 Hypercharge notes using Catchy Chorus. Hypercharge notes do 300 damage.

items.description: When it comes to Karaoke, Melodie shows no mercy. Armed with her kawaii looks and devilish set of pipes, she never fails to steal the limelight.

items.name: ANGELO

starPowers.name: EMPOWER
starPowers.description: Staying inside the Super will heal Angelo for 300 per second.

starPowers.name: FLOW
starPowers.description: Angelo gains 25% increased movement speed after entering water.

gadgets.name: STINGING FLIGHT
gadgets.description: Fly into the air for 1.0 seconds. Drains 300 health from nearby enemies on takeoff.

gadgets.name: MASTER FLETCHER
gadgets.description: The next Take Aim pierces enemies and the environment.

attack.name: Take Aim
attack.description: Hold the aim to charge up your shots.

super.name: Welcome To The Swamp
super.description: Angelo creates a poison cloud that lasts for 8 seconds and damages enemies. While in the cloud, Angelo's arrows become poisoned, dealing extra damage over time.

hypercharge.name: In My Element
hypercharge.description: During Hypercharge, Angelo's Super follows him!

items.description: Angelo is the Love Swamp's resident cupid-turned-mosquito. They buzz around the canals looking for lovebirds to dazzle with their irresistible charm, even if those require a little extra, pointy incentive.

items.name: DRACO

starPowers.name: EXPOSE
starPowers.description: Every 5 seconds, the next Lance Stab exposes enemies on hit. Exposed enemies take 35% increased damage for 5 seconds.

starPowers.name: SHREDDING
starPowers.description: Dragon Solo now also heals when activated.

gadgets.name: UPPER CUT
gadgets.description: The next Lance Stab also throws enemies in the air for a short time.

gadgets.name: LAST STAND
gadgets.description: Draco can not fall under one health for 2 seconds.

attack.name: Lance Stab
attack.description: Draco thrusts his lance forward, piercing and damaging enemies in front of him, dealing more damage at max range.

super.name: Dragon Solo
super.description: Draco mounts up on his fire breathing dragon, gaining increased movement speed and damage reduction.

hypercharge.name: Fire and Flames
hypercharge.description: Draco's dragon breathes more flames in a wider area and with longer range.

items.description: Riding his inflatable dragon and setting off fireworks, Draco promises a show-stopping finale every night. With his electric guitar blaring and his flame-spewing ride rocking the crowd, he turns the fantasy up to eleven!

items.name: LILY

starPowers.name: SPIKY
starPowers.description: After teleporting to an enemy, Lily's next attack deals 530 more damage.

starPowers.name: VIGILANCE
starPowers.description: Gain 15% movement speed while an enemy is in her Super charge radius.

gadgets.name: VANISH
gadgets.description: Lily enters the Shadow Realm for 3 seconds.

gadgets.name: REPOT
gadgets.description: The next flourish, becomes a thrown attack, and Lily teleports to the destination on impact.

attack.name: Thorn in the Side
attack.description: Lily stabs in front of her with her thorns, dealing damage.

super.name: Flourish
super.description: Throw a seed in a straight line. If it hits an enemy, Lily teleports behind them.

hypercharge.name: Germinate
hypercharge.description: Lily's Flourish now bounces off walls, and transports the enemy and Lily to the Shadow Realm for 5 seconds.

items.description: A nerd at heart and a total witchcraft buff, Lily's thirst for knowledge once led her into the Enchanted Woods, where an incident involving a firefly and a carnivorous plant would change her life forever...

items.name: BERRY

starPowers.name: FLOOR IS FINE
starPowers.description: Berry gains 50% increased reload speed when standing on his own melted ice cream.

starPowers.name: MAKING A MESS
starPowers.description: Berry's next attack gains 20% extra damage on impact when painting an unpainted area.

gadgets.name: FRIENDSHIP IS GREAT
gadgets.description: Berry swipes his tail, knocking back enemies and healing nearby allies for 871 health.

gadgets.name: HEALTHY ADDITIVES
gadgets.description: Berry's next main attack area lasts for 100% longer.

attack.name: Meltdown
attack.description: Berry throws melted ice cream at a targeted area, damaging enemies and healing allies on impact and over time.

super.name: Sweet Swirl
super.description: Berry dashes forward, spinning and dropping melted ice cream around him, damaging enemies and healing allies on impact and over time.

hypercharge.name: Double Scoops
hypercharge.description: Sweet Swirl drops double the scoops of ice cream!

items.description: Working at Mandy's Candy Shop, what could go wrong? EVERYTHING! Luckily, Berry has the patience and toughness of a workhorse. He seems to hate every second of his job, but at the end of his shift, you might catch a brief smile.

items.name: CLANCY

starPowers.name: RECON
starPowers.description: Clancy starts the match with 3 tokens.

starPowers.name: PUMPING UP
starPowers.description: Clancy reloads all of his ammo on every enemy takedown.

gadgets.name: SNAPPY SHOOTING
gadgets.description: Clancy gains double tokens for 5 seconds.

gadgets.name: TACTICAL RETREAT
gadgets.description: Clancy dashes and reloads 1 ammo.

attack.name: Power Wash
description: Clancy's attacks upgrade each stage.
STAGE 1: Clancy fires one paintball.
STAGE 2: Clancy fires a second paintball each attack!
STAGE 3: Clancy fires 2 additional paintballs diagonally each attack!

super.name: Torret
description: Clancy's Super upgrades each stage.
STAGE 1: Clancy fires a torrent of paintballs in a cone in front of him.
STAGE 2: Paintballs travel further.
STAGE 3: Paintballs deal 16% additional damage!

hypercharge.name: Recall of Duty
hypercharge.description: Clancy's Super paintballs pierce enemies then quickly return to him, dealing damage again.

items.description: There's no turning back with Clancy (unless Hank orders him to). He's fully embraced his fake crustacean life and will do anything for his comrades.

items.name: MOE

starPowers.name: SKIPPING STONES
starPowers.description: Moe's basic attacks bounce one more time. The range of the attack remains the same.

starPowers.name: SPEEDING TICKET
starPowers.description: Moe's Driller has increased travel speed.

gadgets.name: DODGY DIGGING
gadgets.description: Moe digs up some 'borrowed' goods, increasing his Super charge rate by 50% for 5 seconds.

gadgets.name: RAT RACE
gadgets.description: Moe dashes a short distance in his Driller, destroying walls and knocking back Brawlers in the process.

items.description: Moe is a blind rat, found living in the Starr Park sewers by Grom, who then quickly adopted him! Now part of Starr Park's maintenance team, Moe uses his special digging machine, Driller, to traverse the sewer tunnels... and also cause a bit of destruction throughout the park, much to Ash's dismay.

attack.name: Shovel Slinger
attack.description: Moe throws a rock that bounces once, breaking into a smaller rock. Each rock smashes into stones on impact. Rocks and stones both deal damage.

super.name: Torret
super.description: Moe gets into his trusty Driller, drilling to targeted location, dealing damage and knocking brawlers up at the destination. He gains a new attack in his Driller form.

attack.name: Giga Drill Break
attack.description: Moe starts drilling in front of him, gaining movement speed and dealing damage to enemies in front of him.

super.name: Ball Out
super.description: Moe exits his Driller and returns to his normal form.

hypercharge.name: The Big Cheese
hypercharge.description: Moe's Driller has longer range and lasts for longer!

items.name: KENJI

starPowers.name: STUDIED THE BLADE
starPowers.description: Slashimi's slices have 30% longer range.

starPowers.name: NIGIRI NEMESIS
starPowers.description: After avoiding damage for 5 seconds, gets 60% damage reduction from the next enemy attack.

gadgets.name: DASHI DASH
gadgets.description: Kenji's basic attack only uses Dash for the next 3 seconds.

gadgets.name: HOSOMAKI HEALING
gadgets.description: Kenji instantly heals 75% of damage taken over the last 3 seconds.

attack.name: Dash 'N' Slash
attack.description: Kenji's basic attacks alternate between a Dash and a Slash. Dash deals damage to all enemies in a straight line and Slash deals damage to all enemies in a wide area in front of him.

super.name: Slashimi
super.description: Kenji targets an area with precise slices, dealing heavy damage and gaining invulnerability for the duration of the Super.

hypercharge.name: All You Can Eat
hypercharge.description: Pulls enemies to the middle of his Super, and re-appears in the center of the X instead of at the starting location.

items.description: This highly skilled sushi chef has a wholesome life running his restaurant in Starr Park, but it feels like he's trying to hide something about his past... though his sushi tastes so good, nobody cares!

items.name: SHADE

starPowers.name: SPOOKY SPEEDSTER
starPowers.description: Hitting opponents with the center of Shade's main attack gives a short movement speed.

starPowers.name: HARDENED HOODIE
starPowers.description: Shade gets 30% damage reduction while in its Incorporeal Form.

gadgets.name: LONGARMS
gadgets.description: The next main attack has 50% longer range.

gadgets.name: JUMP SCARE
gadgets.description: Shade spooks nearby enemies, slowing them for 4 seconds.

attack.name: Haunted Hug
attack.description: Shade hugs its opponents with a wide embrace, accidentally dealing damage, and doing more damage to those caught in the center of the hug. It can also hug enemies through walls!

super.name: Incorporeal Form
super.description: Shade leaves the physical world and can move directly through the environment. It also gains a movement speed boost.

hypercharge.name: The Frightener
hypercharge.description: Shade's attacks during its Hypercharged Super all deal maximum damage, even if the enemy is not hugged in the center.

items.description: Not much is known about this mysterious pile of clothes, other than the fact it has some cool sunglasses. Discovered by Gus, Shade was given a name and now the two spooky Brawlers haunt the Ghost Station together.

items.name: JUJU

starPowers.name: GUARDED GRIS-GRIS
starPowers.description: Gris-Gris is summoned with a protective shield.

starPowers.name: NUMBING NEEDLES
starPowers.description: Gris-Gris' attack now also slows the enemy for 1 sec.

gadgets.name: VOODOO CHILE
gadgets.description: Juju's next main attack has the power of all three elements.

gadgets.name: ELEMENTALIST
gadgets.description: Juju gains a temporary buff based on the current environment she is standing on. Earth: Damage reduction .Grass: Invisibility. Water: Increased movement speed.

attack.name: Elemental Energy
attack.description: Juju throws projectiles empowered by the environment she is standing on, giving them different properties! Ground: More damage .Grass: More range. Water: Has a slowing effect

super.name: From the Other Side
super.description: Juju summons Gris-Gris. This spooky voodoo doll drags itself to the nearest enemy and throws damaging needles.

items.description: Juju owns the Oddities Shop and is followed everywhere by her “pet” voodoo doll, Gris-Gris (pronounced Gregory). Although she can control the elements, Juju is also a talented toymaker who makes dolls to sell to Starr Park's many visitors.

items.name: MEEPLE

starPowers.name: DO NOT PASS GO
starPowers.description: When you shoot through environment, deal 300 more damage.

starPowers.name: RULE BENDING
starPowers.description: Critical success also increases allies' reload speed within the area by 20%.

gadgets.name: MANSIONS OF MEEPLE
gadgets.description: Meeple's next attack creates dice towers around the impact area and deals 500 damage.

gadgets.name: RAGEQUIT
gadgets.description: Meeple lashes out in rage at nearby enemies, stunning them and knocking them back. Ragequit stuns for a longer period of time the fewer hitpoints.

attack.name: Boomhaven
attack.description: Meeple shoots various projectiles that will slightly home towards the nearest enemy.

super.name: Critical Success
super.description: Meeple cheats, somehow rolling a NAT21 on a d20, allowing all team projectiles in the Super area to pierce through environment for 10 seconds.

items.description: Meeple knows the rules to every board game in existence and if you break them... Well let's just say you don't want to break them. They hate cheaters and those who don't follow the rules. There's one exception to the rules... Meeple themselves!

items.name: OLLIE

starPowers.name: KICK, PUSH
starPowers.description: While near walls, Ollie kicks off his hoverboard and gains 20% extra movement speed.

starPowers.name: RENEGADE
starPowers.description: After dashing forward with his Super, Ollie gains a 4000 decaying shield over 4 seconds.

gadgets.name: REGULATE
gadgets.description: Ollie jumps and does a rad kickflip, hypnotizing all enemies where he lands for 1.0 seconds.

gadgets.name: ALL EYEZ ON ME
gadgets.description: Ollie's next attack will hypnotize any enemies hit for 1.0 seconds.

attack.name: Bring the Ruckus
attack.description: Ollie's hoverboard fires soundwaves which deal damage and go through enemies.

super.name: Hypnotize'
super.description: Ollie dashses forward with a gnarly hoverboard trick and starts charging a music blast, dealing 800 damage and hypnotizing all enemies around him for 2.5 seconds. While charging the music blast, Ollie will use up to 50% of his max ammo. Enemies will move towards Ollie and cannot be controlled while being hypnotized.

hypercharge.name: Ain't No Half-Supering
hypercharge.description: Ollie now jumps! His music blast area is larger and it won't consume ammo when it starts charging.

items.description: Ollie rides his customized hoverboard around Starr Park, grinding rails and causing trouble! A fan of old school hip hop, Ollie blasts his favorite tunes wherever he goes. His music is infectious... literally. Brawlers can't help but dance when they hear it.

items.name: LUMI

starPowers.name: 42% BURNT
starPowers.description: The explosions from Lumi's Blast Beat also set the area alight for 4 seconds. Fire damage also scales with explosion damage. Damage per second for the biggest explosion: 280.

starPowers.name: HALF-TIME
starPowers.description: Lumi slows enemies hit by her recalled morning stars for 1 seconds.

gadgets.name: HIT THE LIGHTS
gadgets.description: Lumi ignites her morning stars on the ground, producing flames which damage nearby enemies for 3.9 seconds. Damage per second: 180. Cooldown: 14 seconds.

gadgets.name: GRIM AND FROSTBITTEN
gadgets.description: Lumi creates freezing winds around her morning stars on the ground, creating a slippery surface for 3.9 secs. Cooldown: 23 seconds.

attack.name: Good Morning... Star
attack.description: Lumi throws one of her morning stars. She can throw both of her weapons, with her third attack recalling them, dealing damage to any enemies caught in their path!

super.name: Blast Beat
super.description: Lumi pounds the ground three times, causing explosions that deal area damage. The third explosion briefly snares enemies, making them unable to move but still able to attack.

hypercharge.name: Drum Solo
hypercharge.description: The final explosion from Lumi's Super has an extra blast on both sides.

items.description: A passionate metalhead and a talented drummer, Lumi traded her drumsticks for morning stars when she got her job at Starr Park. She controls elements of ice and fire, which reflects her shy nature and her burning passion for music!

items.name: FINX

starPowers.name: HIEROGLYPH HALT
starPowers.description: Finx reduces the reload speed of any enemy Brawlers hit by his main attack by 30% for 3 seconds.

starPowers.name: PRIMER
starPowers.description: Damage dealt only from Finx's projectiles that are sped up by Time Warp, will increase the Super duration by 0.25 seconds each.

gadgets.name: BACK TO THE FINXTURE
gadgets.description: Finx steps back in time, returning to the position and ammo he had 3 seconds ago. Cooldown: 18 seconds.

gadgets.name: NO ESCAPE
gadgets.description: Finx's next center projectile from his main attack freezes the enemy in time for 2 seconds, making them unable to take actions for the duration, but also making them immune to any damage. Cooldown: 17 seconds.

attack.name: Chronocast
attack.description: Finx fires 3 long range projectiles, with the outer ones dealing 50% of the damage of the center projectile.

super.name: Time Warp
super.description: Finx warps time in an area, decreasing the projectile speed of enemy Brawlers caught in the Super, while increasing the projectile speed of any teammates and himself. Finx's projectiles will also get a damage buff.

hypercharge.name: Temporal Traveling
hypercharge.description: Finx activates an additional Time Warp around himself that follows his movement.

items.description: The owner of Starr Park's escape room, Finx is meant to help visitors complete tasks. Instead, he uses his time controlling abilities to cause mischief! Also, he LOVES cats.

items.name: JAE-YONG

starPowers.name: THE CROWD GOES MILD
starPowers.description: Being near teammates gives Jae-yong a 10% speed boost per teammate in range.

starPowers.name: EXTRA HIGH NOTE
starPowers.description: Main Attacks now deal an additional 20% Damage per target pierced.

gadgets.name: WEEKEND WARRIOR
gadgets.description: Deals area damage and increases main attack damage for 5 sec.

gadgets.name: TIME FOR A SLOW SONG
gadgets.description: Jae-yong slows enemies around him and his attacks will leave trails of slowing paperwork for 5 sec.

attack.name: Work Hard, Play Hard
description: Fires a piercing projectile, with different effects depending on Jae-yong's mode.
WORK: Deals less damage, but creates slipstreams with projectiles that give speed boosts to teammates and himself.
PARTY: Heals teammates with a piercing, damaging projectile.

super.name: Mix It Up
description: Switch between Jae-yong's Work & Party modes! Switching modes changes Jae-yong's main attack and activates the matching ability.
WORK: Gives all nearby teammates a temporary movement speed boost.
PARTY Heals all nearby teammates.

items.description: By day, Jae-yong is your average office worker. By night, he is a karaoke GOD... or so he thinks. The jury is still out on his singing skills.

items.name: KAZE

starPowers.name: ADVANCED TECHNIQUES
starPowers.description: Ninja Aspect: Hitting an enemy in a Strike Spot also slows them by 30% for 2.5 sec. Geisha Aspect: When a marked enemy is defeated, they will deal damage to other enemies.

starPowers.name: GRATUITY INCLUDED
starPowers.description: Ninja Aspect: Removes 34% ammo from brawlers initially caught in the Fan Storm. Geisha Aspect: Increases duration of Gadget effects by 50%.

gadgets.name: GRACIOUS HOST
gadgets.description: Ninja Aspect: Gain 30% Movement Speed for 2.5 sec. Geisha Aspect: Heal for 30% of max health.

gadgets.name: HENSOJUTSU
gadgets.description: Ninja Aspect: Gain invisibility for 2 sec. Geisha Aspect: Dash forward.

items.description: Kaze was raised to be a living weapon by her parents, but this was not the life she wanted. After escaping to Starr Park with Kenji, she can now live how she wants. However, she is still torn between the two aspects of her life, being a humble geisha and a deadly ninja.

attack.name: Kaze's Delivery Service
attack.description: Kaze dashes a short distance and strikes the nearest target. Kaze has a 'Strike Spot' at a fixed angle around herself. Hitting an enemy in a Strike Spot deals 200% damage and resets the Strike Spot to a new position.

super.name: Fan Storm
super.description: Kaze throws her fans, creating a deadly storm of fans in an area. Enemies within the Fan Storm can't see outside of it. The Fan Storm will also deal damage to an enemy if they touch it.

attack.name: Silent Shuriken
attack.description: Kaze throws 2 knives in succession, dealing increased damage to closer targets.

super.name: Fish of the Brawl Star
super.description: Kaze dashes a long distance and marks enemies she passes through. Marks explode after 2.5 seconds.

hypercharge.name: Ancient Energy
hypercharge.description: Ninja Aspect: The center of the Fan Storm damages enemies over time. Geisha Aspect: Kaze gains increased dash speed and her marks instantly damage if the target's health is low enough to be defeated.

items.name: ALLI

starPowers.name: LIZARD LIMBS
starPowers.description: While enraged, Alli regenerates health faster out of combat after only 1.5 seconds.

starPowers.name: YOU BETTER RUN, YOU BETTER TAKE COVER
starPowers.description: Alli reloads 40% faster while enraged.

gadgets.name: FEED THE GATORS
gadgets.description: The next main attack heals Alli for 100% of damage dealt. Cooldown: 10 seconds.

gadgets.name: COLD-BLOODED
gadgets.description: Alli becomes enraged for the next 6 secs. Can only be activated when an enemy is visible. Cooldown: 14 seconds.

attack.name: Swamp Swipe
attack.description: Alli dashes forward, swiping as she goes. When in a bush or water, Alli will leap forward instead. The range of Swamp Swipe scales with her movement speed

super.name: Stalker
super.description: Alli gains stealth (pulsing invisibility). Attacking does not break stealth. The next main attack she does will deal increased damage based on the enemy's current health percent. The higher their current health, the more damage Alli will deal!

items.description: Alli is the shy mechanic of the Love Swamp. She loves to get her hands dirty, by either fixing broken machines or... mercilessly stalking other Brawlers. If you're walking home late at night and hear an odd noise, it's probably Alli trying to say hello.

items.name: TRUNK

starPowers.name: NEW INSECT OVERLORDS
starPowers.description: Ants also reduce the damage of enemies by 15%.

starPowers.name: COLONY SCOUTS
starPowers.description: Ants reveal hidden enemies.

gadgets.name: FOR THE QUEEN!
gadgets.description: Trunk instantly spreads ants in a large area. Cooldown: 7 seconds.

gadgets.name: WORKER ANTS
gadgets.description: Trunk heals from the first source of damage taken for the next 2 secs. Cooldown: 16 seconds.

attack.name: Ant Attack!
attack.description: Trunk spins in a circle after a short delay, dealing damage to enemies and dropping ants. Standing near ants gives Trunk a 20% movement speed boost and 30% damage boost. The edge of the attack deals more damage to enemies.

super.name: Driven by Revenge (And Ants)
super.description: Trunk propels themselves at enemies, dropping ants along the way. They can bounce off walls too!

hypercharge.name: Retreat
hypercharge.description: Trunk's Super causes them to leave ants on enemies which deal damage over time.

items.description: Trunk is a suspiciously uncanny looking tree. It couldn't be because Trunk is actually a colony of hyper-intelligent ants controlling a fake mechanical tree? No, that would be ridiculous.

items.name: MINA

starPowers.name: ZUM ZUM ZUM
starPowers.description: Mina's combo Attack 3 also heals for 50% of damage done.

starPowers.name: BLOWN AWAY
starPowers.description: Mina's Super also roots enemies on the spot.

gadgets.name: WINDMILL
gadgets.description: Creates a wall of wind that blocks projectiles for 3 sec.

gadgets.name: CAPO-WHAT?
gadgets.description: Mina's next Super recharges instantly if it hits.

attack.name: Capoeira Combo
description: Mina can cycle through three ranged attacks in a certain time period. If she doesn't attack fast enough, her combo is broken and the cycle restarts.
Attack 1: Long range & narrow (800 dmg)
Attack 2: Medium range & medium width (1400 dmg)
Attack 3: Short range & wide (2200 dmg)

super.name: Furacão 3000
super.description: Mina hits the air, creating a powerful hurricane which deals heavy damage and launches enemies in front of her.

items.description: Mina is a b-girl who mixes capoeira into her breakdance battles like it's second nature. She hangs out at SK8 Beats with Ollie and uses his mixtapes to practice new moves!
